"Who's this Belladonna?" she asks. Belladonna gives an evil smirk as you shiver. "Wade, meet my older sister from Horrorville, Astrid Solanaceae. Astrid, this is my new boyfriend Wade." "How did I get myself into this mess?" you think to yourself. Predictably Astrid raises an eyebrow. "You... dating a human?" Well, it wasn't so much dating as it was sexual abuse, but you're too scared to speak. Belladonna just crosses her arms. "You're one to talk, what about that human mate of yours? Where is Ashley anyway?"

Astrid grits her teeth slightly. "I left Ashley in Chel's care when I left for the reunion. It's way too dangerous for a human here." Oh no, Astrid had a human wife? Or husband, given that Ashley used to be a boy's name. This was not looking good for you. Belladonna just lets out a laugh. "Yeah. Kinda risky. I hear that bitch of a landlady of yours doesn't even know you're keeping a human behind her back." "By the way Belladonna," says Astrid. "Where did you meet Wade?"

You're really nervous about Belladonna telling her sister something like that. "Well," said Belladonna as she scratches your chin mockingly. "I picked him up at work." Astrid is slightly confused but then she puts two and two together and gasped. "He's an inmate?" she asks. "You snuck a criminal out of Under Gloom? Destiny is going to kill you." "I won't tell if you won't," says Belladonna smugly. "That ambition of yours is dangerous little sister," says Astrid. "But at least you've found a use for humans other than food. I can hear wedding bells already."

You let out a groan and try to shake free, but you're stuck too tight. And you've only met one of Belladonna's relatives. Not good. You'd rather be taking your chances with Cree right now.
12512211112.title: Belladonna Solanaceae

125122111121.content:
Belladonna smirked at you, but unlike her other ones that you've seen thus far, this one seemed a little distracted.

"Just to warn you, Wadey. My mom is a little..." Belladonna said. The way she left it hanging didn't make you feel any better.


Mirrors and candles filled every available space. You couldn't look anywhere without seeing your own reflection. Above the mantel, a little bronze scorpion flew around the second hand of a ticking clock. Stacked on the nightstand were hundreds-and you mean hundreds-of Tupperware boxes with peanut butter and jelly sandwiches inside. The ones on the bottom were green and fuzzy, like they'd been there for a long time. On top of the dresser was a stack of cookie sheets. Each one had a dozen burned cookies on it. In the corners of the room was a mountain of empty plastic Kool-Aid pitchers. Taped all around the window, were dozens of little pictures cut from magazines and newspaper ads-pictures of Hermes from the FTD Flowers logo and Quickie Cleaners, pictures of the caduceus from medical ads.

And in the middle of the room, in a rocking chair, sat another member of Belladonna's family.

This manticore was as thin as a scarecrow and looked like someone who enjoyed sticking her fingers in electrical sockets. Her white hair stuck out in tufts all over her head. Her pink housedress was covered in scorch marks and smears of ash. When she smiled, her face looked unnaturally stretched, and the high-voltage light in her eyes and the way her gaze seemed fractured-like she was trying to focus through a kaleidoscope-made you wonder if she was blind.

"Belladonna!" the woman cried, bolting upright and zooming over to her, she squeezed the smaller manticore rather tightly, unknowingly causing you pain as she crushed you.

"Hello mom." Belladonna said and the other manticore released her.

Mom? This was Belladonna's mon?! Looking at her, you swallow any comments you had, no wonder you captoress was so nervous. But looking at her, you seemed to be able to sense that it wasn't her fault.

"Mom...I met someone that I like. It was part of why I came here." Belladonna said, trying to avoid looking at her mother, her voice cracking. As if it would shatter her will to live if she met her mother's eyes.

"Really?!" Ms. Solanaceae cried in delight, clapping her hands in front of herself and beaming.

"Mother, would you like to meet them? I brought him with me so he could meet you and the rest of the family." Belladonna said, plucking you from her breasts. Holding you up to her mother's face "Mom...meet Wade."

Her mother beamed and you saw a third of her teeth were broken. You plaster an awkward smile on your face and wave at her.

"A Human? Well, to each their own, right, Bell! I'm happy for you! Ho, he's lovely! Now off you go to mengal! I'll get a church on the phone in the meantime! No later than tomorrow!" Ms. Solanaceae cries happily, a spark seems to come back to her and she even looks slightly less crazy. She ushered Belladonna out of her room and grabs a phone and starts hammering numbers to make a call.

Wha..?! No later than tomorrow?! Sheesh! Belladonna and her sister Astrid really weren't kidding about being rushed down the alter! You didn't want to marry a monster! Why'd you try escaping jail again?!

You're snapped out of your thoughts as Belladonna runs a clawed finger down your back, stroking you. You turn to see Belladonna's face frowning down on you with a troubled expression.

"I know what you're thinking Wade. Suggest you don't. My mom wasn't always that way." Belladonna said sadly "She was a good person, but she was mugged. Nightmare. Beast who can alter appearance to their will and shatter minds. Broke something in her and she's been a bit...off, ever since. She only seems to get her old self back when she gets news like that."

"So you became a cop and got a job at Under Gloom to keep it from happening to anyone else?" you asked.

"Yeah..." she said.

Then she brightened. "I'm glad she likes you. And trust me, you're safer that way."

Safer?! If that was the case, you didn't want to know if she disapproved of you! Especially here! As Belladonna carried you

the other members of her family all caught your scent or something, because they all looked at you...some of them licking their chops.

"Hey Belladonna, brought a snack huh?" one of the males, you didn't know if he was a cousin, uncle or what, said, eyeing you. Fortunately Astrid smacked him upside the head with her tail.

"Jason! He's NOT food! Belladonna had him meet your aunt!" Astrid snapped, she looked downright murderous at the idea of a human being eaten. Ok, a human-lover...those kinds of monsters you could stand. They left you alone if you asked.

at the bomb dropped by Belladonna's sister, the other manticores in the room all stared at you, eyes wide and started muttering among themselves, the females giggling occasionally.

"Wait...but that means..." Jason said, then turned to Astrid "You got her to convert?!"

"As if!" Belladonna snapped at him "This one's a unique case, is all! No way am I giving up meat...Wade here's an exception to that is all!"

The other members of her family nodded, and you paled. Belladonna was still gonna be a human-eater!? But she wasn't going to eat you?! Then again...between being married to or being eaten by her, you were beginning to wish she'd just eat you!
125122111121.title: Meeting with Mother

1251221111211.content:
Well, it's doomsday for you. Ms. Solanaceae was very insistent you marry Belladonna and hear you were in a tux in a waiting room with Ms. Solanaceae who seemed to be twitching. You take a good look at her broken teeth and are utterly terrified. "Don't be afraid," says the elder manticore as one of her eyes spins around. "I know you're joining a family of predators but I have experience with a human in-laws. Take Ashley, Astrid's husband... or wife... I can never remember the gender... but you'll meet him or her... pity Astrid had to leave him... or her... in Horrorville. Guess that's the trouble with being from a family of giant poisonous lions." That didn't make you feel any better. "How did I get into this mess?" you ask yourself. Ms. Solanaceae leaves the room to check on the bride as you groan. Astrid looks at you nervously but then shrugs her shoulders.

"I wish the best of luck to you." "Bite me!" you yell in response. Astrid lets out a sarcastic laugh. "That's the last thing you should ask a manticore to do." You slap yourself in the face and then shake your head. "You know," says Astrid. "Something tells me you're not going to be a very good brother-in-law, so I'm just gonna let the best lady escort you to the alter." You roll your eyes. "Best lady?" you ask to yourself. "I wonder who?"

"Well isn't this a surprise?" asks a familiar voice. You gasp and turn around to see Destiny in a red dress looking down at you with a smirk. "Destiny!" you yell in surprise. "So that's how you managed to escape," says Destiny. "I should'e known. That double-crosser. But remarkably, I'm not mad. Sure the governor chewed me out and one more slight like that will more than likely cost me my job, but I can live with that if it means watching you squirm. You two deserve each other."

"Destiny," you beg. "Please take me back to Under Gloom. I'll serve my sentence without complaint. I'll even stop calling you 'Demona'. Please! Get me out of this!" Destiny just smiles wickedly and shows her fangs. "Oh no. This is much better punishment than prison. If anyone deserves to be saddled with Belladonna, it's definitely you." As Destiny is laughing, you begin to break down and cry. This was really it, you were going to be married to a monster. Being eaten would've been preferable to this.

Before you could run, Destiny snatches you up. "Well," she says. "No point in delaying the inevitable." "Cree!" you shout. "Help me! Clover!" You were so desperate now that you were calling for a predator to chomp you. But soon, Destiny has you waiting for Belladonna and organ music plays as Belladonna walks forward in a white bridal outfit, her mother smiling, though the other manticores are all staring at you. This was not looking good as Belladonna finally reached you and smiled. You mentally scream as you look up at the dark elf preacher. "Dearly beloved," he says. "We gather here to unite this manticore and this... human... in holy matrimony."

As the preacher is speaking, you look for any way out but there's no way you're getting out of this. On your side of the church, you see Destiny brought guests as well. Cree was there in a black dress with her were jackal wife Aurelia with her. Like Destiny, Cree seemed to find your predicament hilarious. Clover was there and half asleep as she held the chain holding your roommate Lockette and Bebe, the Cheshire cat girl. Bebe was crying uncontrollably given that she was the one who wanted you and now somebody else was marrying you. You have to wonder why Destiny brought those two in the first place.

That's you hear "I do" from Belladonna and gasp. Oh no. The preacher turns to you. "And do you Wade Wilson, take Belladonna to be your wife." This was bad. If you backed out now you'd have a mob on your back. You turn to see Destiny with an evil smirk right before she waves at you and realize you have no choice. "I do." The preacher nods his head. "I now pronounce you... man and wife."

You were definitely better off in Under Gloom.
1251221111211.title: Wade Solanaceae

choices: Skip to the Next Month of Pregnancy
12512211112112.content:
"Three years, two days," you mutter to yourself. "Three years, two days." That was exactly how long you had been married to Belladonna. You couldn't believe it. Three years ago in a botched escape attempt from Under Gloom, you wound up being married to the vice warden. To say Belladonna had henpecked you since then would be a gross understatement. You were practically her slave. Your sense of smell has been numbed from years of massaging your manticore wife's feet and your stomach was burning from years of monster food. It didn't help that Belladonna wasn't exactly the best cook. But the worst part would be her raping you every night.

You wish you could get a way out of this but unfortunately, Mrs. Solanaceae, that is to say, Buttercup, now your mother-in-law, informed you that manticores mate for life and females don't have more than one mate in their entire lifetime. You were screwed both metaphorically and literally. What's worse is that whenever you even tried to get in line, you are reminded that Belladonna still has that iron cage.

It was no use. Going back to Under Gloom would be better than this. You wonder how that old bat Destiny was doing. No matter how she was doing, Belladonna was still the vice-warden. One day she'd becoming the main warden and when that day came, you'd really be in for some bossing around.

Speak of the devil, you heard the front door open and your... ugh... your wife walked in as chipper as can be. "Wadey," she calls out. "I'm ho-ome." "Thanks for the warning." You think to yourself. You look up from atop the coffee table just as Belladonna smiles down on you and shows you her hundreds of sharp teeth. You're utterly terrified. Every time she smiled like that it meant there would be painful consequences for you.

"I've got some wonderful news, Wade," says your manticore wife. "Very wonderful news." "Y-You f-finally b-became warden?" you ask. Normally you'd be shooting your mouth off but after years of violent domestic discipline have destroyed whatever backbone you had towards the titanesses that you now realized ruled over your life.

Belladonna just lets out a giggle that freezes you to the core. "Even better." She says. Belladonna grabs you screaming and then she pushes you to her belly when you realize just what she was talking about and gasp. "Y-y-you don't mean..." You say in fear. Belladonna nods her head and flashes her teeth. "That's right, sugar. I'm pregnant."

You mentally screamed. If there was one thing you hated as much as monsters it was children and now you were expecting both of them at the same time. It was official. The moment you were press-ganged into marrying Belladonna, you walked barefoot into hell.
12512211112112.title: 2D3Y

choices: Switch back to Wade and Belladonna
125122112.content:
Meanwhile, back at Under Gloom, Destiny was in a foul mood having had to deal with you escaping from Under Gloom just as the governor was visiting. "I can't believe it," says the gargoyle giantess. "Ten years as warden, a spotless record and the first prisoner to escape is that TINY little upstart Wade! How is that even possible! Why didn't any of the guards see him! I was so ashamed I was tempted to resign then and there. The only thing stopping me is that Governor Liza threatened to fire me if this happened again."

Destiny is so angry that she scratches the top of her desk with her sharp claws and grits her fangs as her eyes glow red. "Well played Wade," she says. "Looks like you finally got the drop on 'Demona'. But if you think you're enjoying your freedom, well WHOOP DEE DOO! You're not out of the woods yet. I know your kind, you CAN'T stay out of prison long. Especially when I'm in control."

Destiny reaches for her phone and begins to dial as she lets out a hiss. "I can't believe I'm doing this. Me, reduced to hiring a lowly bounty hunter to deal with the most loudmouthed, obnoxious, insignificant little bug that society has cast out. And they don't come any lower than Bona Fete." Destiny dials the phone and elsewhere there is a rundown looking house that looked like it was the home of a thug. There was even a skull shaped doorknob and jagged metal littering the lawn. There was also a motorcycle in the driveway that had screaming souls painted on it with a grim reaper shaped hood ornament.

Inside the house was Bona Fete, a 950ft gray skinned gargoyle chick with bulging muscles bearing tattoos of all the monster criminals she's ever killed. She had black hair and wore a shirt bearing the Punisher logo on it. She was busy drinking a beer as her pet Fenrir, a giant carnivorous feral wolf, was chewing on what looked like a large dinosaur bone. The phone rings and the Fenrir growls. "Easy Ripper," says Bona as she reaches for the phone. "Hello. Bona Fete, who do you want me to slaughter." Bona belches slightly into the phone before Destiny speaks.

"Your father may have been worthless," Destiny says. "But at least your mother could've sent you to charm school." Bona cracks a smirk and shows her fangs. "Well, well, if it isn't Ms. High and Mighty Warden of Under Gloom. What's shaking Demona? And how's my half-sister doing." Destiny is annoyed as she continues speaking. "Don't you dare call me that horrible word and don't you dare compare yourself to my Fate. Listen Bona, I hate you and you don't really like me much, so I'll cut right to the chase. As much as I hate to admit it..." Destiny bites her lips before she continues but Bona laughs as she gets the gist of it.

"You mean somebody finally snuck out from under your big blue nose? Man Destiny, you're slipping in your old age." Destiny slams her fist on her desk and makes it crack slightly before continuing. "Do NOT patronize me bounty hunter! Your target is a human escapee called Wade Wilson. He's been the bane of my existence since he came to Under Gloom and tried to escape even more times than any of the Dark Siders. He finally got out and I want you to get him."

Bona Fete finishes her beer and scoffs. "You're sending me after a human? Overkill much." "This is no mere human. Whatever you do, bring him back alive. If anyone is going to clobber him, it will be me." Bona nods her head and tosses her beer bottle into the air before shooting it with a handgun and blowing it to bits. Ripper even catches one of the pieces to chew it up as he growls. "I love this job." Says Bona with a smirk as she sharpens a knife with a claw.
125122112.title: Destiny's Revenge

choices: Bona and Belladonna Force You into a Threesome
1251221122.content:
While you were suffering as Belladonna's boy toy, Bona has already armed herself with a chainsaw and a bazooka as Ripper follows close behind her with a growl. "Easy, Ripper," says Bona as she sharpens a machete. "Remember, this is a human that we're dealing with. I'm neutral when it comes to humans, though I have stepped on them before."

Ripper growls right as Bona opens the front door of her house. There is an overgrown pterodactyl flying in the air and as Bona notices her fenrir drooling, she gives a smirk and then shoots down the pterodactyl before Ripper growls and catches the flying reptile in the air before greedily devouring it. "Ripper just loves fresh cooked pterodactyl." Says Bona as she puts her gun away and lets out a laugh.

The gargoyle giantess then heads to Under Gloom to speak with Destiny who is giving her a sour look. Destiny gives Bona a glare as Bona looks up and smirks at her. "I loathe you," says Destiny. "Of all bounty hunters, you are the absolutely most primeval proof against evolution that has ever poisoned my eyes. Your father was complete and utter SCUM! If he were here right now, I'd wring his neck and make him eat his own liver." "Yummy," says Bona sarcastically. "Listen here, Demona, I'm not the one the governor chewed out earlier for letting this pest get out from under your nose, that pest that might I add, you hired me to exterminate."

Destiny makes her eyes glow red as she looks down at Bona and this provokes Ripper to growl at your gargoyle nemesis and even try to bite her. "There's an amazing new invention called a leash, Bona," says Destiny. "You and that improperly trained fenrir. Why do you even keep that stupid mutt around!" Ripper just gives a growl before Bona strokes him on the head.

"Because Ripper is good at two things; killing and tracking. Now, all he needs is one of Wade's personal belongings." Destiny grunts and tosses one of your prison jumpsuits for Bona to catch. Bona holds the jumpsuit right in front of Ripper's nose as he growled. "You have the scent?" asks Destiny. "Oh," says Bona. "Don't worry. You'll get Wade back. As long as I get my two thousand skulls." "Two thousand skulls!?" yells Destiny. "That's outrageous!" Bona lets out a laugh. "Outrageous? I'm giving you a discount since the prey is human. Besides, what's worse for that pride as big as your ass? Hiring me, or knowing that you let this lowlife get away?" Destiny lets out a growl and soon Bona and Ripper are off.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Back at Belladonna's place, you're screaming and Belladonna is laughing mercilessly as she teabags your body in bed. "Come on, Wade, scream until I get tired." Belladonna laughs and you scream as she rubs you against her armpit. She moans in pure pleasure right before she uses you on the other armpit. It was official, all you did was trade one prison for the other and Belladonna then started to pull her underwear down.

You look at her oversized ass underneath her scorpion tail and it's clear what she's going to do to you. "No!" you yell. "Please, don't!" Belladonna is about to shove you up her ass when there's a knock at the door." Belladonna grunts and holds you down as you sigh in relief. "Thank goodness." You say. Belladonna opens the door and hears a growl as she looks down and sees Ripper. She then looks up and sees Bona.

"Belladonna," says Bona. "It's been a month since I saw you." "Bona," says Belladonna. "I... I wasn't expecting company." That's when you freeze in fear as Belladonna holds you. "Bona Fete?" you ask yourself. "Destiny hired a bounty hunter? Oh crap." Bona and her pet walk in as Ripper sniffs around.

"Oh, don't mind me, Belladonna," says the gargoyle bounty hunter as her tail swings back and forth and you look at her muscles. "I'm here on business." You look up at Bona's tattoos and see that the monsters she killed included among others, a gorgon, a bahamut, a sphinx, an argus, a minotaur and even a bandersnatch. "In fact, there's somebody I'm looking for." "Uh-oh." mutter both you and Belladonna.

Ripper sniffs around Belladonna and growls. He would've bitten the manticore but Bona stopped him. "Ripper, no, Belladonna's a friend." You're gasping in fear and then Bona looks down and sees you. "Ooh, but he isn't." You let out a scream as Bona takes out a gun. But then Bona realizes something and smirks at Belladonna.

"Oh, you sneaky cat. So this is how you're finally going to get the one up on old big blue butt." Belladonna smiles. "You caught me, Bona." "You know," says Bona with a smirk. "I think I'll let him live, just this once. If only to watch Demona squirm." Belladonna and Bona let out a laugh. This was just great.

How could this get worse?
1251221122.title: Bona on a Mission

12512211221.content:
Suddenly you find yourself jerked from Belladonna's hand by Bona's tail as the gargoyle bounty hunter looks down on you with an evil smirk. "Belladonna, you do realize that I'm going to have to turn him into Destiny but the problem is that I'd like to have some fun with him." Belladonna gave a smirk and reached into a wastebasket to take out the bones of a human she ate earlier. "I have an idea." She said. Bona follows Belladonna into the kitchen as Ripper walks to the corner and then turns around three times before laying down on the floor.

Belladonna then rips off your clothes with a grunt before she takes them and the bones and puts them in a frying pan to make it look like Bona shot you to death. Then she lays the charred remains of the bones and clothes and puts them in a drawer as Bona gives a smirk. "Aha," she said. "Good idea, Belle. That way, I get paid and I get to have some fun." Both giantesses laugh evilly and you're filled with intense fear.

"So," says Bona. "What were you going to do with him when I got here, Belladonna?" You look up in fear at the manticore giantess as she looks down at you and gives a smirk. "I was about to use him as a buttplug." says the manticore woman. "Ooh," says Bona. "I've got to try that one out later." Bona lifts up her tail and shakes it as it is still wrapped around your body. "But first, I have an idea. A little tail to tail action." You let out a gulp and then yell.

Bona wags her tail around like a windmill and you're spun around screaming and even crying. To make matters worse, Belladonna bends over and swings her own scorpion tail, missing Bona's own tail but narrowly missing you. At one point, Belladonna's tail tip even cuts off most of your hair as you scream. Bona laughs wickedly and then slams her tail in front of her butt cheeks as you moan.

"Now let's make it interesting, Belladonna." Says Bona as she shows her gargoyle fangs." Belladonna lets out a purr. "What exactly did you have in mind?" she asks. Bona gives an evil laugh as she holds her wings up in the air. "Tail tug of war. Winner gets to shove Wade up her ass for two whole hours." You mentally gulp. What did you ever do to deserve this?

"Ooh," says Belladonna as she shows her three sets of hundreds of teeth. "Sounds good." Belladonna then wraps her tail around you and you scream as both she and Belladonna pull on you. If it's not the manticore vice warden, it's the gargoyle bounty hunter. No matter who wins, you'll be seeing a monster's behind from the inside. To make matters worse, Belladonna's poisonous tail is dangerously close to your chin.

This sucks.

So who wins the tail tug of war?
12512211221.title: Tail Torture

choices: The poison wears off sooner than expected.
12513.content:
Belladona ponders what to to do with you. As she does this you see her tail swinging back and forth, as if taunting you. "I know exactly what to do with you." she says menacingly. You wonder what she means until you see her stinger get closer and closer. Immediately you begin to struggle, but it does no good. Eventually the tip is in plain view, and in a flash it darts forward into your arm. It was only the very tip, but to a human it was more than enough.

You struggle even harder until you feel your body start to lose energy. You lose all movement and shut your eyes in terror, waiting for the end. This doesn't happen though. You open your eyes and see Belladona's wicked smile, showing every one of her teeth. "Don't be a baby." she teases. "I can either use my poison to paralyze as well as kill. You're extremely lucky today. I would eat you, but instead I'll use you to make old leather wings look bad."

You see the world rushing past you as she moves you towards the pocket of her uniform. "I can't count on you if you're running around just anywhere though. So I'll hold onto you until the governor gets here. The poison should wear off around that time." You are then deposited into her pocket. The world moves as Belladona begins walking. After some time....
12513.title: A Poisonous Tale

125131.content:
As you sit inside your new "cell" you curse the giant manticore that is currently keeping you. You curse in your head of course because you can't even move your mouth thanks to that damn poison. All you can do is move your eyes, which doesn't do any good. All you can see is the dark room that is Belladona's pocket.

However, as you sit there and wait for Belladona to take you out a stroke of luck occurs. You can feel your energy slowly returning. Not much, mind you, only enough to clench your fists slowly. After some effort though you find that you can move your whole body again, albeit slowly. Not wanting to waste time you start to climb the inside of the vice-warden's pocket. Since you're moving so slowly and carefully Belladona doesn't even feel you.

Eventually you make your way to the mouth of the pocket. When you poke your head out slightly you see that the governor hasn't arrived yet. They are getting ready, however. Destiny is there issuing orders to the prison staff while Belladona observes with a bored look on her face. You decide to try to make your way down her pant leg, making sure to keep moving slowly so she doesn't notice. Do you make it though?
125131.title: Taking it Slow

choices: She tells Lockette to make sure you stay put.
She tels Belladona to give you another shot of paralysis
12513122.content:
You slowly climb down Belladona's leg, with the gigantic manticore not noticing. All you have to do is make it out of this all right and then wait for the poison to wear off. Once thats done you can think of another strategy for getting out of this hole. As you carefully descend you think to yourself how stupid this overgrown freak will feel when she realizes you escaped. Your thoughts are interrupted as you reach the bottom however, when someone notices you.

"Belladona, whats that on your leg?" asks the voice you least wanted to hear. You had hoped that everyone would be too busy preparing for the governor's arrival to notice you, but Destiny apparently spotted you. You skip the rest of your climb and let yourself fall to the floor. You land with a grunt and crawl away as fast as you can, which isn't very. Belladona spots you and an angry look crosses her face as she steps over to you. In a flash, however, Destiny gets to you first.

"Wade!" she says angrily as she picks you up between two claws. "I've been wondering where you went!" She notices your sluggishness and turns to Belladona. "What was he doing on your leg Belladona, and why is he moving so slow?" Thinking quickly Belladona makes up a story. "I don't know what kind of crazy scheme this human was trying to pull, but when I saw him trying to crawl away I hit him with some of my poison. That's why he's moving like that." Destiny's used to your actions, so she accepts this explanation, that or she doesn't feel like arguing.

The gargoyle looks you in the brings you to her eye. "I don't know what you were trying to do, but I don't have time for it today Wade!" she tells you. You muster up all the energy you can to respond. "Bite.......me.......Demona." you answer slowly. Destiny bares her fangs and angrily storms off to your cell. When she gets there she gives you the rundown. "Listen, I would punish you for this, but the governor's coming and I need everyone in their cells. You're going to stay put or else!" She says that last part very threateningly. "But just to make sure...."
12513122.title: Spotted By The Warden

125131221.content:
"Lockette!" yells Destiny. Lockette wakes up and looks in fear at the warden. "Y-Yes ma'am?" "Make sure your cellmate behaves himself and stays put. I can't have anyone acting up while Governor Liza is visiting. Understand." "Yes ma'am," says Lockette. "Understood, ma'am."

Destiny then lowers her head to face you. "You're walking on thin ice Wade. The governor isn't even here yet and already you've tried to break out. I don't have time to put up with you today." "Then why not just let me out of these retard farm of a hellhole, Demona." Destiny growls and her eyes glow red. "Would you stop calling me "Demona"?! I am not Demona! If you call me "Demona" just one more time, just one more Demona, I swear on my grandmother's grave that I will send you to the electric chair and fry off your balls faster than you can say "Hell to Pay"! Understand!"

"Understood," you say. "Mr. Hitler." Destiny obviously doesn't find that "Mr. Hitler" remark any less insulting than being called "Demona and she gets so mad that she punches a hole right in the wall by your cell while yelling words too colorful to write down. Destiny then growls and turns to Belladonna. "And Belladonna," she says. "If I find out you were trying to help Wade escape just to get me in trouble, there will be hell to pay." Belladonna just rolls her eyes as Destiny walks away before deciding to follow her. "I hate it when she says that."

You give Destiny the finger as she walks away. "Wade," says Lockette with a sigh. "You're always getting yourself into hot water with the warden." "Hello," you say. "You're stuck in here under her tyranny as well you long necked dumbass." "I'm in here because I did something bad," said Lockette. "Unlike you, I respect the law." "That woman ain't the law," you say. "She's a disgusting sadist who holds us back and treats us like vermin." "That's not true," says Lockette sternly. "You're the one who's always pissing her off and causing her trouble. One of these days you're going to drive her insane."

There's suddenly a strange giggling. "Maybe someday is today." There was suddenly puff of smoke. "WTF!" you yell. Lockette lowers her head and then appears what looks like a human woman dressed in a black and purple jester outfit, her face colored white with black lipstick. "Surprise!" she yells. "Who the hell are you?" you ask. The girl just lets out a laugh. "My, aren't we a grumpy puss." "Of course I'm grumpy you painted bitch," you say. "I'm in freakin' jail."

"Ah, ah, ah," says the girl. "Is that any way to treat the woman who is going to break you out of here. Allow me to introduce myself. I'm Kltpzyxm." "Kwiplethim?" asks Lockette. Then Kltpzyxm appears in a puff on Lockette's face. "No. Kill..." As she said that she turned her outfit into a Kill Bill style outfit. "Tip." She then flicked a quarter into Lockette's forehead. "See!" She turned her eye into a giant eyeball. "Zim!" Finally she made her face look like that of Invader Zim and then finally Kltpzyxm turned back to normal.

"What the hell do you want?" you ask. Kltpzyxm let out a laugh. "I'm from the tenth dimension and I've been watching your quarrels with that Destiny woman. I love it when you make her all mad. She's funny." "Oh," you say sarcastically. "She's real funny alright." "Which brings me to a proposition," says Kltpzyxm. "I have power to control reality itself. I can gaslight her for you, make her see what nobody else does and the governor will think she's flipped her tiara and gone bananas and then Big Mama Smurf will find herself committed. They wouldn't let somebody with mental problems run this place would they? I can make your big problem disappear, just like that. What do you say?"

You begin to think about it, if Kltpzyxm was able to drive Destiny insane, you'd be rid of her for good. But Lockette isn't so keen on the idea. "Don't do it, Wade, I don't trust this Kltpzyxm." You start to think about it and then you tell Kltpzyxm...
125131221.title: Kltpzyxm

choices: Suddenly, the van is stopped by a giant clawed hand
125131222.content:
"Belladonna." Says Destiny, turning to her second in command "give him another shot, just to be sure he stays put." Belladonna does as Destiny says, and injects you in the shoulder with more poison from the tip of her tail. Not enough to kill you, but just enough to leave you completely paralyzed.

As Destiny lays you out on your cot, and you scream a string of curses at her that would make a sailor blush inside your head, Destiny says to herself "Ah, silence. Maybe I'll have him poisoned everyday for the rest of his sentence. That should keep him from escaping again."

The visit from the governor goes off without a hitch, and you spend all night staring at the ceiling, unable to move, imagining ways to get back at that blue bitch, and her freak vice warden. It's not until the next morning that you regain the feeling in your limbs and torso, and can move again.

Funny enough, just as you're getting up off your cot, Aria, one of the guards, approaches your cell and announces "Wade Wilson , your bail has been paid. You're free to go." Needless to say, this left you in a mix of joy and confusion. Joy, because you were finally getting out of this godforsaken place, and confusion because who the hell would pay your bail? You have no living family, and your criminal buddies certainly don't have that kind of money.

Regardless, you are escorted to the reception area of the prison, where a human man dressed in a black suit and glasses is waiting for you. His appearance reminds you of Agent Smith from the Matrix movies.

"Mr. Wilson, if you'll please come with me."

As you follow the man outside, you can't resist flipping off the prison staff one last time, eliciting a growl from Cree and Clover. You are lead to a black van waiting out front and are seated in the back with the man sitting across from you.

For several minutes you endure the silent ride down the mountain before finally asking "So, just who the hell are you guys anyway?" " The man In the suit smirks "You may call me Mr. Black. I represent an organization that, considering we just got you out of one of the worst places on earth for a human to be, I would say you owe us a great debt, wouldn't you agree?"

"Cut the crap, just tell me what's going on."

"Very well. Tell me, Mr. Wilson, did you ever read comic books as a kid?"

"What the f*** does that have to do with anything?"


"It's just kind of ironic that your name is Wade Wilson, the same name as a certain comic book character. You see, the character in question gained his superhuman abilities through scientific experiments. Which is exactly what we're offering you. A little bit of surgery, and we can make you indestructible."

"Hold up, you got me out of jail just to be your lab rat!?"

"We prefer to see it as giving you new lease on life. We've seen your record, Mr. Wilson. Burglary, grand theft auto, assault, and most recently, arson. This is your chance to do something better with your life, to do something for not just your country, but for your whole species."

"What are you talking about?"

"It's simple really. Our organization sees all of monster-kind as a threat to humanity's very existence. What we need is a subject who despises them on such a level, he would have no problems with wiping them off the planet. Judging by what we know of you, I'd say you fit the bill perfectly. Accept our offer, and not only will you be doing the human race a great service, but you will gain abilities beyond the dreams of mortals. Refuse, and we can turn around right now and throw you back in the slammer."

What is your response?
125131222.title: An Offer You Can't Refuse

13.content:
You gulp as you turn to the right and begin to run. You knew of a shortcut to the outside of the prison, but to get there you needed to go through Dark Side. The Dark Side was the section of your floor where they kept inmates that committed the most heinous crimes. Crimes so severe, they were given life (or eternity if they were undead). They were so dangerous even the already thuggish guards had trouble with them. No human that ventured into their territory had ever come out because the creatures here were all predatory beasts that wouldn't think twice about eating tiny humans.

But as you reach Dark Side, you feel tremors from footsteps but they're unusually strong even for a monster's vibrations. This was one big monster. You turn and then you scream. "You gotta be kidding me." You see a shadow on the floor that looked like it had bat wings, horns and a lizard like tail. This was your worst enemy, Warden Destiny. "Oh no," you say. "If that blueberry skinned bat catches me out of my cell, I'm in serious trouble."

You turn to see several cells of the inmates in Dark Side and get an idea. While being in the same cell with one of these manglers was dangerous, being caught by that thousand foot tall gargoyle would be even more dangerous. Warden Destiny had little tolerance for prisoners that tried to escape and hated you the most because you tried to escape more times than ever. You had no choice, so you inhale and run into a cell.

Fortunately for you, Destiny turns the other way and walks away as you let out a sigh of relief. But then you realize that you're in the same cell as one of the Dark Side prisoners. Maybe they didn't know you were here. Perhaps they were still asleep. You didn't know which of those monsters you were in the same cell with until you look around and see that you're in the same cell as...
13.title: Dark Side

choices: ...isn't fooled, and keeps you to herself.
...is interrupted by a guard, getting her attention for some reason.
131.content:
You look around in vain, squinting your eyes, trying to get a good idea of who's cell you'd managed to stumble into. But they didn't call this place the 'dark side' for no reason. It was really dark...the windows were so heavily locked up that tiny streams of light about your size flowed into the cells, not nearly enough light to really see the place. You shudder as you imagine what it's like here at night.

Deciding that leaving is probably the best option, you start making your way towards the giant cell bars when a sudden "CLACK" sound fills your ears, and you freeze. You hear a yawn, followed by even more clacking sounds. You didn't dare move. You didn't know anything about this inmate. What if they had hyper sensitive hearing, and would hear you making a break for it? Or if they'd see your small form running amidst the darkness? The only movement you dared to make was to turn around and get a good look at the inmate, and can't help but gasp.

Standing far too close for comfort were the gigantic hooves of Mariah, the Quagga rapist who you really wished you weren't going to see today. Her entire lower body was identical to a zebra's, from the patterns on its fur to the tail swishing back and forth. Peering upwards even higher, at around neck level for an ordinary quagga, stood the upper body of a woman...and an unpleasant sight at that.

She had no modesty of any kind, wearing no prison uniform to speak of, although that could be attributed to her lower body making it difficult to fit into the single-piece prison uniforms. Her body was...graciously endowed, so to speak, but that really didn't matter, since you really didn't want to be near her either way. Her face was unpleasant and garish looking, but you couldn't tell if it was always like that or the scars on her face attributed to it.

Either way, you were done looking, you'd seen more than enough. Slowly, so as to not get her attention, you begin to tip toe away from her, towards the cell doors...before screaming as her giant, pudgy fingers wrapped around you, easily snatching you up before you ever had a chance. She brings you up to her face, and a toothy grin crawls across it, making you shudder. "Awfully brave for a human, aren'tchu, little guy?" she says in a mocking tone. Gulping, you try to speak. "This is all a big mistake, miss... Mariah, ma'am. I was just walking down this hallway, and I wandered in by accident."

"Oh really? You accidentally walked into jail cell of Fearville's most feared rapist? Sounds to me like you came here for a reason..." she said, her voice trailing off. She clearly had the wrong idea. "...okay, fine, I didn't wander in. I was hiding from Destiny because I'm kind of breaking out of prison right now, so I really need to get going, so if you could just put me down..." "Ha! Oh, please, if only it were that easy, pipsqueak. No, I don't want you to leave... I've been alone for so long. You're the first male human to wander in here on his own in a long, long time, and you really think I'm just going to just... let you leave?"

Crap. Mariah clearly wasn't going to let you go just because you asked her to. And considering the reason she was imprisoned, you still need to get out of there. Mariah looks at you expectantly, like she's expecting you to say something before she does...whatever she's going to do with you. Thinking for a few moments, you suddenly get an idea. "Mariah, what would you say if I told you that I could get you out of here? Open your cell, so you can escape?" "You? You think you can get me out?" she said, her voice full of uncertainty. "I know it sounds crazy, but I know people. If you let me go, I can escape, get them, and we'll come back for. What do you say? An arm for an arm?" Of course, you weren't really going to come back for a terrifying rapist, that was just a ploy to get her to let you go. But you weren't going to tell her that.

The Centauress actually stopped for a moment, considering your offer. As much as she probably wanted to...well, use you, being set free is probably a much stronger desire in her. That is, if you're to be believed. Gazing up at her, practically praying that you'll get the chance to get out of the same cell as this rapist, she finally...
131.title: Mariah, the rapist centauress

choices: She Strips You and Drops You in Her Mouth
She Shoves You up her Rear
1311.content:
You cross your fingers and hope that Mariah will set you free. However, as she's pondering it over, the centauress giantess shakes her horse's rump back and forth and lets out a giggle as she shows you her teeth. "Oh no," says the centaur as she pets you like a pet. "Oh no, no, no, no, no, my little friend." You gasp as Mariah looks down on you and even begins to drool.

"I'm not letting you go that easily. The last human that got in my cell was just too much fun. Until he died of septic poisoning that is." She then taps her brown equine rear and shakes her tail. "I still haven't gotten him out. Dang, he's in deep." Mariah giggles and looks down at you. She even licks you as you scream. "Aw," says the centaur rapist in a mocking tone as she holds you dangerously close to her breasts. "Wanna want this pony little boy?

You're terribly afraid of what this rapist centaur has planned for you and even bite your fingers as she holds on tight. "Oh Wade," says Mariah as she drags one of her front hooves on the ground. "I'm really going to enjoy this."

What does that psychotic centaur do with you first?
1311.title: Wild Horses

13111.content:
Mariah quickly removes all of you clothes and tosses them aside. holding you up towards her face so she could get a better look at you. you try and cover yourself but the massive centaur shifts her hands causing you to fall over and exposing yourself to her. "Well look what we have here" she says with a lust filled voice "Not the biggest I've ever seen since that minotaur but defiantly the biggest on a human. I can't wait to have a taste." drool begins to fall from her lips as her tongue parts her lips. "Please stop this" you cry in desperation only to be interrupted by the warm wet appendage as it slow drags itself across your body taking extra time near your neither regions. "delicious" she says as she begins to lick her lips you try and escape but are thwarted as the centaur tosses you into her waiting mouth and begins to suck on you like a piece of candy.

you're tossed around the giantess' moist mouth as she continues to have her way with you. the onslaught of her tongue on your exposed nethers and the warmth of her breath have had its desired effect upon you as you are forced around the dark mouth. Mariah moans and begins to speed up her ministrations slowly bringing you closer and closer to the edge. soon you pass the point of no return and release yourself onto her tongue. "Ooh thats tasty" Mariah purrs as she continues to stroke you with her tongue "now what to do with you next I wonder? you are a delicious little morsel and I've worked up quite the appetite but I've also gone and gotten myself all hot and bothered and you're now so deliciously slick. Decisions decisions."

What does she decide to do
13111.title: She Strips You and Drops You in Her Mouth

1312.content: Mariah contemplates your proposition and is about to give you her decision as you hear a cell door slam shut. "Must be time for my hour in the yard" Mariah says. "What are we going to do?" you ask franticly as the sound of the approaching guard gets closer and closer. well I guess I'm going to have to hide you. . .
1312.title: Yard time

choices: Mariah has made a move on Icy
13121.content:
"I'll just hide you in my cell" Mariah states calmly "And I have just the spot for you". she then walks quickly towards the back wall of her cell and begins to slide a brick out of the wall. "this could be my chance to escape!" you thought as you imagine a hole in the wall allowing you to climb down and out of this prison.

Unfortunately you aren't quite that lucky as the brick is removed only to reveal an enclosed space and no exit. "hide in here until I'm done" Mariah says as she throws you into the hole. you land roughly onto the stone surface and are about to complain as Mariah pushes the brick back in place. just as the brick is replaced you hear the muffled sounds of the cell door closing and the faint sounds of voices.

"Lets go I don't have all day" Icy says impatiently as Mariah walks forwards from the back of her cell. "Oohh if it isn't the new girl. Icy, was it?" Mariah says with a hint of lust in her voice "I do love Harpies. so petite, so delicate, and yet so fierce". she begins to advance on the guard before Icy pulls out her club. "That enough you beast, lets just get you to the yard before Destiny has my ass".

From the darkness of Mariah's Hidden compartment you can barely make out the conversation and can't help but shiver at the Monster's depravity. as your eyes adjust to the light you begin to make out the shapes of other things left behind in the compartment. in the front there is what can only be described as a shiv which appears to be composed of a sharp chunk of metal tied to a toothbrush. there is also a pack of cigarettes and what looks to be some sort of locket. but the worst is what you find in the back. behind all these items is a rather large clear horse shaped dildo at the base you notice that there is a cover that screws off and within there is a small compartment that is currently occupied by a human skeleton. you gasp and immediately step back towards the brick not wanting to be anywhere near the sadistic sex toy. just then you hear a noise from outside. what is it?
13121.title: the Hidden compartment

131211.content: You are startled by a sudden crash as a fight seems to have broken out within the cell between the two giantesses. It would appear that Mariah has decided to try and claim Icy. however if the noises are any indication then it would appear as though the Harpy isn't giving up without a fight. as the two crash and struggle around the cell your compartment begins to shake. who comes out on top?
131211.title: Making the move

choices: The wolf wakes up and notices you
The guards come in to inspect
132.content:
Persephone.... it is the worst possible even to be in her cell right now. That white wolf has a good record for sniffing and for eating other monsters for her own sick game. You are just disgusted, just like her body smell from all of those monsters and humans she ate in her entire life. She is currently asleep right now after exhausting her energy, and you had to move slowly as wolves respond well. You walk quickly for a little while, thankfully not making any sudden loud noise, and you held your breath for a long time throughout. You then look at her face, it was nice in terms of look, but if you were to make the wrong choice now... it would be the end.

It was true, she was in-fact a human killing machine. As much as she likes eating other monsters, she loves eating humans 100 percent. In fact.... one time she went on a rampage in Tokyo, Japan, and ate thousands of people. It took a lot to stop this giant wolf monster from destroying Tokyo, it took the military, etc... and at one point... another monster to tame this beast. She was charged for murder of many monsters, and etc... and surprisingly for her, she was going to be given the death sentence. It was such a bad thing to see a monster in person, but to be close to it when your getting out, even worse.

What happens now?
132.title: Uh....oh!

choices: Persephone makes you undo her muzzle
Persephone puts you in the lock to move the tumblers
She hides you and waits for a guard to bring her breakfast
1322.content:
You try to step away but you accidentally step on a broken human bone and then you see Persephone's ears twitch and let out a gasp. The white wolfess was getting up and her red eyes glow bright as she gets on the ground and walks up to you. You're shaking in fear and then look up and you're in pure surprise. Persephone was wearing a muzzle around her mouth. Of course, that makes sense. This cannibal werewolf was so dangerous she even tried to eat the guards when they first brought her to the prison. The woman tried to bite Cree's stomach open and tear off Clover's ears. So it would make sense that Destiny would restrain her.

But that doesn't do much good since she sees you. "Hello human," says the white werewolf as she waves her tail. "How nice of you to drop in. Warden Destiny has forbidden everyone, even my cousins Lupa and April from visiting me and leave me caged up like an animal all day while even the other dark siders get to come out for chow and rec. Kinda harsh even for a psychotic killer. It's not as if eating humans is a crime for monsters. I guess I'm just what you might call a foodie of the most extreme case. I believe that I outdid the yeti food stew with the spaghetti I mixed with naga entrails."

You shiver and shake as Persephone comes forward. "Even the guards and other prisoners here look delicious. Especially when they have a nice fat werehyena and a Loch Ness monster with succulent looking fins. The only reason the warden's off the menu is because gargoyle meat is harder to chew than truck tires. But sometimes I like to splurg a little bit when it comes to humans. You try to run but then Persephone puts her paw in front of you and stares at you with her bright red eyes as she gives an evil laugh. "Don't worry, I won't eat you... for now anyway. Not yet. I've got plans for you little human." Persephone laughs evilly and you even screams as drool comes down from the werewolf's muzzle.
1322.title: The White Wolfess

choices: You hop out of the other side of the lock and make a run for it
13222.content:
Her massive handpaw came down towards you before you even had any time to react. Your vision was filled entirely with white as she raised you higher and higher, probably to crush you into paste and shove that through her muzzle. This werewolf woman was psychotic, more so than any other monster you've seen or met. But as you clenched your eyes tight and awaited your fate, it never came. Instead you found you were placed on solid ground, the air strangely smelling of tin and other metal.

You opened your eyes to find yourself in a small room, gears all around, two holes on either side of the room. One hole was replaced with Persephone's red eye to gaze at you.

"Now, be a little buddy and open that lock for me?" She growled. Now you understood, she had placed you inside the lock to her cell. You were just the right size to open it, and you did have some kind of knowledge when picking locks, you had done it before a few times, but those were normal, human-sized locks. Plus, you weren't too sure about freeing this deranged monster.
13222.title: Persephone puts you in the lock

choices: Nope, she can't be bargained with.
132221.content:
Against your better judgement you decide to help Persephone out. She most likely won't return the favor, but at the least could provide a distraction for you. "All right," you say. "I'll do it, but you have to help me escape too." Her giant eye reappears and she agrees. "Of course, its only fair." Not that you believe her in the least. You don't trust any of these beasts, let alone a murderous cannibal like Persephone.

You set to work. Its not easy considering you've only ever picked human-sized locks. "Do you almost have it?" she asks impatiently. "Hold on a minute." you reply irritably. "I've never actually picked a lock from the inside." It takes a little while, but eventually the lock clicks. Well, to Persephone it was probably a click. To you it was more like a gigantic THUNK.

"Good job human." Persephone says as you hop out of the lock. Before you can get away though she snatches you up."Now get to work on this damn muzzle." You know this is your opportunity for a deal. As she puts you on the muzzle you give her an ultimatum. "I don't think so. Take me with you and I'll undo the muzzle after we sneak out of this hole." Persephone doesn't take too kindly too this. "Why you puny little twerp!" she almost yells before lowering her voice as to not draw one of the guards. "I could squash you like the bug you are! Now get this muzzle off me or I'll introduce you to the bottom of my foot!"

"You probably would have done that anyway you albino freak! At least this way I have a chance of getting out. You can either kill me now and wander around until you get caught or we can work together to make it out." you tell her. "I'll remove the muzzle once we're home free." You can see the anger in Persephone's huge red eyes as she weighs her options.
132221.title: You open it for her

1322211.content:
"Fine, but as soon as we escape you undo this thing." Persephone tells you angrily. That muzzle is your only bargaining chip. As far as you can tell she can't rip it off by force, and she seems really strong even for a monster. The guards and Destiny must have the only means of getting it off. That, or you could try to do it from the inside like you did the lock. Not that you actually planned on letting this beast free, but you'll have to cross that bridge when it comes. You're just happy she fell for your little bluff.

As you go through this in your head the white wolfess knocks you down with one of her clawed fingers."Agreed?" she says impatiently as she holds you down on the the muzzle. "Yeah yeah." you say. "Lets just get out of the hellhole. The sooner I'm rid of this place and you, the better." After she lets you up Persephone lifts you between two fingers.

"What are you doing?!" you exclaim. She brings you to one of her eyes and glares at you."Well I have to keep you somewhere until we're out don't I?" she says annoyed.

Where does she keep you?
1322211.title: Partners..For Now

"Well clearly" you say "but where are you going to put me? its not like you have any pockets on that thing". Persephone seems to ponder this for a moment before she finally decides on a location for you. "I know just where to keep you, just don't get any ideas human" and with that she pulls out the front of her jumpsuit giving you a clear view of her large breasts. "you have to be joking" you say as Persephone drops you into the cavernous valley between her tits. "now hold still human we're leaving". you feel a shift as Persephone begins her escape attempt. you cant help but notice the warmth coming off her body and before long you begin to lose your grip.

What happens next?

"what the hell are you doing human?" Persephone growls.knowing where you likely ended up you try and force yourself away from her body only to succeed in eliciting a moan from the giantess. your eyes begin to adjust to the light and you soon find yourself staring at Persephone's
132221112.title: Slide down the suit

13222112.content:
Persephone places you on top of her head. You find yourself surrounded by white fur. "This mutt better not have fleas." you grumble, eliciting a growl from the wolfess. "Watch your mouth human. The only pest on me right now is you." You give a grunt and situate yourself near one of her ears.

The world begins to move as your fellow escapee makes her way through the prison. You hope this freak knows where she's going. She is constantly whipping her head around on the lookout for guards, so you experience some turbulence. Eventually she comes to a plain-looking door. This is the way out you were heading for in the first place. It leads to the prison yard where they let the prisoners exercise, but it was for guard use only.

"Hey! This is it!" you tell Persephone. "This door leads to the yard!" Your original plan was to sneak under the door, but now you'll have to change tactics with the addition of your accomplice. "Well how are we supposed to open It?" the wolfess asks you frustratedly. You tell her to lower you to the keyhole so you can have a look. Can you open the lock from the inside like you did in the cell, or are you going to have to go looking for a key?
13222112.title: On Her Head

choices: Yes, you make it to the bottom.
No, Destiny knows you escaped and they're looking for you.
132221121.content:
You have a look at the lock and see that its very similar to the other one you had to open. You're pretty sure you can open it. You hop into the lock and get to work. You briefly consider jumping out the other side and making your escape, but Persephone would probably alert the guards if you abandoned her. Its not like she has anything to lose, they'd just send her back to her cell. It doesn't take as long opening the lock this time, since already have some experience. You head to the opening and are greeted by Persephone's white paw. You guess she's not about to let you skip out on her.

When you're back on her head she opens the the door and walks out. Guess they never thought a human would open the doors from the inside. You can smell the air outside and can't help but appreciate it, as does Persephone who wasn't allowed outside at all. Its beginning to get dark outside and the guard tower is shining its searchlight, trying to spot anyone in the yard. Persephone manages to avoid the light, and makes her way to the wall on the other side.

When she reaches the fence you wonder how the two of you will get out of here. Your question is answered when the Persephone begins to rapidly dig at the dirt. She's tunneling out! Guess her being a mutt is good for something. Luckily she manages to successfully dig her way to the other side. Its not over yet though, you still have to make it down the mountain. Are you lucky enough?
132221121.title: Prison Break

Seems like no one's noticed your escape yet, as you and Persephone manage to make it safely down the mountain. Once she reaches the bottom Persephone quickly heads into the city. You're thrown around a bit as Persephone stands up and walks through to the spare bedroom. She fishes you out of her cleavage and places you on the bed then proceeds to lie down. “How about a foot-rub since I do all the walking for us?” Persephone bluntly suggests with a grin. “Excuse me? I am NOT doing that! Rub your own horrible monster-feet!” You yelp back, folding your arms affronted. Persephone’s smile fades as she rolls her eyes. “Fine” she responds dryly.
You’re shaken off your feet as she shifts around to slip her cigarettes out of her pocket. A smokey mist soon begins to fill the room as Persephone inhales and exhales. You feel strangely compelled to watch her as she puffs away on her cigarette, Imagine that; years of loneliness and the first companion to come your way is a giant cannibalistic werewolfess…fuck.

Persephone eventually glances over your way and catches you staring. Her eyes shift between you and her cigarette. “Wanna smoke?” She asks, almost politely. “How am I going to smoke that? Your cigarettes are bigger than me” You quiz back defensively. “C’mere” Persephone commands in a soft tone as she reaches over and picks you up by the collar. You’re hoisted up into the air and eventually placed in the palm of her paw-like hand. “Get ready, I’ll go slow” she says as she moves you closer to her mouth and drawing in smoke from her cigarette. Her fingers arch over you a little as she begins to release the smoke gently into her cupped paw. You inhale some smoke and by sheer volume you being to cough. Persephone giggles as she moves you a little away from her mouth to catch your breath. “Well that’s an improvement I guess. The first time I blew smoke in your face you gagged” She recalls. “Yeah that might have had something to do with you chowing down on a monster not long before! There was still blood on your mouth!” You quip back, still slightly defensive. Persephone doesn’t respond but the deep sigh that escaped her and the smile she let fade once again was a response enough. “What’s up with you?” You ask, trying to act none the wiser. “Nothing” she answers back, clearly not done sighing. “Will you just tell me damn it!” You yell exasperatedly, tired of the silent victim act. “What do I have to do to get you to like me?” Persephone finally responds, not even looking at you. “Stop being a monster” you answer back directly. You thought this was the truth until you felt a spike in your heart. A tear had quickly begun to travel down Persephone’s cheek. Regret started to swell up in your chest. “I didn’t mean that…” you stutter. “Yes… Yes you did… Admit it; you’ll leave as soon as you get the chance…” she simpered.

With that Persephone stubbed out her cigarette, placed you on the pillow and rolled over facing away from you. A few moments and sniffles later she brakes the silence. “If you want to leave Wade, I won’t stop you…I can force you to stay but I can’t make you love me” Persephone exclaims. This is intense you begin to silently tell yourself. Who would have thought this killing machine was capable of loving something she once considered food?

You walk over to her and begin to scale the giant wolfess, clinging on to her fur as you make your way up her back. After quite a bit of effort you reach the top and are now standing on Persephone’s hip. On one side below you was a massive white cliff that a great, long fluffy tail sprouted from. On the other side was Persephone’s stomach; Resting, titanic and quietly rumbling as it gently inflates and deflates. Many a human and a monster have perished in there, you quietly contemplate. You’re probably the only human to ever get this close to Persephone and not have suffered the same fate. She must really have fallen for you. The wolfess was still gazing ahead of her as she laid there… The fur on her cheek still wet.

As you begin to journey along Persephone’s side, climbing up her arm and walking towards her neck. She turns her head towards you and her ears prick up suddenly, as well as her giant red eyes widen just as you reach her shoulder. “Hey” you say casually. Persephone’s mouth draws open for a few seconds before she is able to speak. “I-I thought you… - “I’m not going anywhere Persephone” you interrupt her. “We’re in this together. I wouldn’t have even made it a tenth of how far I’ve made it without you and I won’t lie, It kinda…really sucked to see you cry” your speech ends. “Wade…” Persephone whimpers. Almost right after she begins to reach out to you and clasps you in her paw. She moves you closer to her and affectionately starts to lick and kiss you. After a few minutes Persephone stops to make eye contact with you. “I care about you a lot Wade” she whispers delicately, another tear making it’s way down her cheek. This time a happy one.

“I care about you too Perse, its just…difficult for me” you admit to her, fighting the moral friction in your mind. Persephone’s eyes very gently blink as she starts nuzzling you. “I know…” she whispers softly. “It was weird for me at first too, I mean I did almost snack on you a few times but the more time I spent with you, the more I realised; you were becoming my friend and then after that night we spent…I knew” she finishes, letting her gaze fall into your eyes. Persephone stays quiet, just holding eye contact with you. You didn’t want to look away. Those big red eyes once threw sharp spears into your heart every time you saw them, now; the same thing was happening but for an entirely different reason.

Your eyes begin to fall ever so slightly. It was getting late. “We should probably get some shut-eye…” you announce, breaking the blissful silence. “Want your usual spot?” Persephone asks through a sleepy smile. Usually this question would have made you feel a bit awkward and left you struggling for an answer but through sheer tiredness, you can’t help it. “Please” you say through a lengthy yawn. Persephone tucks you in her chest and after you both settle’ it isn’t long before the two of you are sound asleep, waiting for tomorrow.

In the morning...
13222112112221212221222121111111.title: Honesty and a Happy Soul.

132221121122212122212221211111112.content:
A loud rumbling noise abruptly wakes you up. You’re still nestled in with Persephone and she was still fast asleep. You decide to try and drift back into sleep until the noise happens again. Startling you upon realising what it was; the noise that woke you up was Persephone’s stomach and it was growling louder each time, sending vibrations throughout her body that even you could feel. Unsettling thoughts started to construct themselves in your mind. What if she was hungry enough to eat you? Should you run while you can? Are you wasting your chance to escape?

After a few minutes of terrifying doubt, a different noise suddenly grabs your attention. It was Persephone stirring in her sleep and what you just heard was a snore. You look up from where you’re perched and see her calm and serene expression as she remains in a deep sleep. In that moment, a wave of admiration drifted over you. She looked so...peaceful, and you just couldn’t help but stare at the giant wolfess. These fears were old habits you decide. It was time to face them down. Slowly and steadily, you begin to make your way out of Persephone’s cleavage. She was lying on her back so you had to climb up towards her neck first and find the best way from there. Once you reach her upper chest, you begin scaling her titanic fur-coated bosoms.

It takes a considerable amount of time to reach the top. Standing for a moment to catch your breath, you look to see the source of the rumbling. Persephone had really put on the pounds over the years eating all of those carnivorous meals…her stomach really was colossal in comparison to you…
Journeying onward towards it doesn’t take very long after you tumble off of Persephone’s breast trying to climb down safely. You hoist yourself up from the crevice between her breast and her stomach and begin clambering up the mountain.

A short but strenuous time later, you eventually find yourself atop Persephone’s gigantic mid-section; still rumbling and gently shaking the surface beneath you. It proved quite difficult to maintain your balance while her stomach kept rising and falling ever so slightly as she breathed, but with every step; you proceeded with casual caution.

Persephone had slept only in her underwear so you were granted a privileged view of her titanic form. Walking around the edges where the sides began to curve was awe-inspiring… You were really high up and couldn’t seem to move your attention from the fact. The sun began shining in through the window; lighting up the guest bedroom further as you ventured towards the centre of her, where the naval began to seep into what seemed like a bottomless pit. Gazing deep into it left you in a trance…it did look comfy. “Want to go in?” You hear a voice from behind you suddenly announce, almost sending you into cardiac arrest. Spinning round to find Persephone had woken up and was admiring you exploring her. This left you feeling slightly embarrassed, you could feel your cheeks burning as the silence after the question continued. “I..uh. I was just stretching my legs, y’know, early bird and all that…” you stumble out. “C’mon now Wade, I’ve been watching you check me out for like.. five minutes. You have a thing for bigger girls, don’t you?” She asks with a naughty smile. “I have a thing for you…” you reply on instinct. Persephone’s face lights up even more and her eyes widen with it. “Let’s have some fun” you say, trying your best to sound seductive. It seemed to work.
Persephone reaches over to you and pushes you gently backwards, sending you tumbling down into her naval. The grumbling was so much louder in here. You could actually hear the gurgling and even some splashes…it was actually quite relaxing…

As you reached out your hands and ran them across the furry walls, you could hear Persephone whimpering in delight. “That feels amazing Wade…” she informs you. “Keep going” she adds through a breathy whisper. You pick up the pace as you continue massaging her. At one point, you even let your face fall against the wall of her naval. Suddenly, the vague amount of light you had began to fade. Looking up to see the walls closing. “You’re going to enjoy this…” Persephone tells you before the light is completely sealed off and the walls clamp together, smushing you between them. Glimpses of light would blink in for less than moments at a time as Persephone squished her large stomach together.

Your pleasurable turmoil ends and not long after you see Persephone’s nail reaching in to claw you out. “Grab on tiny” she commands you endearingly. You lodge yourself on and she lifts you out into the daylight again.
“How was that?” She asks, bringing you close to her face as she sat up. “That was something else…” you mutter, still winding down. “Did you enjoy it?…” Persephone asks slightly unsure. “I think I did, yeah…” you answer her. She giggles before leaning in to kiss you, in response you just let yourself fall against her lips. “What’s the plan for today my little man?” she queries with a content smile. “I’m sure we can come up with something” you respond, returning the same smile with just as much contentment.
132221121122212122212221211111112.title: You wake up before Persephone.

1322212.content:
You smile confidently. Your logic was that Persephone needed you to get out of Under Gloom, after all, you did unlock her cell and allowed for her to escape. But instead, Persephone growls as the cannibal werewolf looks down on you with her bright red eyes."You've got some serious balls trying to bargain with the infamous Persephone human. Except there's one flaw in your plan." You gulp because it looks like you weren't out of the woods yet.

Persephone laughs evilly as her eyes glow bright. "I'm already out of my cell," says Persephone. "And I don't need my teeth to break out. Once I'm outside, I'll find some other way to get this blasted muzzle off. I think a celebratory feast of roasted griffin with vampire blood wine is in order. You my tiny friend have outlived your usefulness."

You scream and try to run but Persephone growls and jumps in front of you. You're frozen in fear as you look at her bright red eyes. "Now," says Persephone as she wags her tail. "What to do with you?
1322212.title: Can't Bargain with a Werewolf

132222.content:
deciding against freeing the massive criminal you seize this opportunity and climb out the other side of the lock."hurry up human" she growls as you shimmey down the bars and begin to run. noticing movement Persephone glances over and sees you running. growling with anger she lunges forward forcing her arms through the bars in an attempt to retrieve you. you dive away from her arms and are swatted through the air landing with a dull thud within another cell

Whose cell is it?
