A shadow looms over you and you look back in time to see a wall of fur descending on you as Cree flops down onto the bed with Aurelia on top of her. They're still in the middle of kissing and begin moving around. Eventually they roll off of you and you try to crawl away. You don't get very far before a claw grabs you and whisks you away. "Ah ah ah, you're not getting away little guy." Aurelia says as she holds you up. "Me and my wife here are gonna have some fun, and you're helping."

Aurelia places you on the tip of Cree's breast, right on the nipple. You don't have much time before her gigantic muzzle comes down and latches on, covering you in darkness. She begins licking and sucking Cree's boob, swirling you around inside her mouth in the process.In a blind attempt to stop you grab onto whatever you can. Turns out you've grabbed onto Cree's nipple, which arouses her even more. When Aurelia pulls back you are once again brought along by a strand of saliva. She picks you up and moves you toward Cree's crotch. You manage to come to your senses in time to see where you're headed. "No way!" you shout. "Put me down you over sized lesbian mutt!" Aurelia smiles lustfully. "Oh you're going down all right." she says. You are then pressed against Cree's crotch and and massaged by two fingers. The were hyena moans and twists about in pleasure. When the torment stops you are momentarily relieved. Suddenly though your view is filled by Aurelia's face. She begins using her tongue to pleasure her wife, taking you along for the ride. After a while of this you are laying on the bed in a puddle of saliva and Cree's juices.
151111212.title: An Unwanted Threesome

15113.content:
Just then, you hear more thunderous footsteps that you realize aren't coming from Cree. When they stop, you hear a voice say, "What's up, lardball? Looking forward to this afternoon?" It was Clover, that grootslang guard that was also out to eat you. She and Cree had made a bet with each other on which of them will eat you first. Ignoring Clover's "lardball" comment, Cree replied "Not that it's any of your business, hose nose, but yes, I am looking forward to this afternoon. There are only two things I love more than the taste of humans, and that's beating the inmates to a pulp, and scaring the shit out of the little punks that come through here every month."

Like many prisons, Under Gloom has a program that exposes young monsters who are at risk of becoming criminals to the realites of life in prison. Every month a group of such monsters is given a tour of the facility, and shown where they'll end up if they don't change their ways.

This gives you an idea. Perhaps you can jump ship from Cree to one of the kids. It might be safer than your current situation, or it might not. But anything's got to be better than risking this sadistic hyena bitch finding you.

Later that day, Cree and Clover are both in the prison lobby, standing in front of a group of teenage monster girls of various species. You had been hiding in Cree's hair this whole time, waiting to get your chance. Just then, Destiny enters the room and stands before the group.

"Welcome to Under Gloom, or as it's known to our inmates, Hell. Each of you had better listen to what I'm about to say, because I'm only saying it once. You are here because you chose to make the wrong decisions in life, and so your parents have given us custody of you all for the day. So for the next six hours, I'm your new mommy. And guess what? I'm a mother who believes in the tough love policy. Ask any inmate here, and they'll tell you that you do not want to mess with this mama, or the punishment will be severe."

It was at this point that one of the girls, a weretiger, let out an unimpressed "Pfft". In an instant, Destiny stormed over toher and got right in her face. "What the hell was that? Do you think this is funny? That I'm joking when I say none of us will hesitate to put you in your place?" The tigress just rolled her eyes.

"Oh I see, you're not taking the situation seriously." Said Destiny with a sneer "Well, we''ll soon fix that. Clover, take this one to the Dark Side and put her in an empty cell. We'll see how serious she is then."

Clover grabs the tiger's wrist and takes her away. Meanwhile Destiny turns things over to Cree, who cackles evilly and she stares down at the group, slapping her nightstick against her palm.


"Well well well, fresh meat. You little pukes know what my job is? To tenderize new meat. My favorite sound in the world is the sound of bones shattering after I give them a good beating with this." She brandished her nightstick, pointing it in a dragon girl's face as she was shaking with fear.

Cree orders the group to follow her, where are they going?
15113.title: Tough Love

1512.content: Which one of the two did you manage to cling to?
1512.title: Clover or Simone

choices: Clover Goes on With Her Day without Noticing You
15121.content:
As you climb up the foot, you notice that it feels scaly and look around to see no fur in sight. But you look down and see that the foot is also rounded with pachyderm like hooves. Then you look up and see which one of the guards you clung to.

This was Clover, a grootslang. A grootslang is a creature said to be a cross between a snake and an elephant. While Clover had the body of an anthro African elephant, she had green skin with the hood of a cobra around her head just underneath her blonde hair and her trunk ended in a snake's head and let out a hiss. Clover was the second most dangerous of the guards after Cree. Despite being part elephant, she was a hardcore carnivore who loved to fill her belly with humans. The snake head at the end of her trunk gave her a second mouth. You've seen her even use it to snatch up some human inmates that tried to escape before she spat the bones out of her other mouth.

What made Clover dangerous to you was that she had a rivalry with Cree and would like nothing better than to eat you before the werehyena giantess got the chance. To avoid detection, you quickly climb up Clover's leg and hide in her shorts. At that moment outside, Clover held her trunk up to sniff around before she let out a trumpet and a hiss at the same time.

Then Clover lets out a groan. "I am starving," she says. "Those last few humans that tried to escape were almost mine. Stupid furball Cree. Well, Wade better be like, totally prepared to die, because when I see him..." Cree makes the snake head at the end of her trunk hiss and lick its lips as you shiver in place. You really hope the grootslang giantess doesn't find you clinging onto her underwear.
15121.title: Giant Grootslang

151212.content:
You hang on tight to Clover's enormous underwear and sweat as you look down at the grootslang giantess's feet. But fate seems to be on your side because Clover lets out a sigh and just walks away. You couldn't believe it. Was the snake elephant woman numb. Maybe you shouldn't look a gift grootslang in the mouth. You had to climb into the fabric of Clover's red underwear and you laugh to yourself.

"This jumbo sized jumbo is my ticket out of here." As you kick back, Clover goes on with her day as a guard and you climb up and peak out of the grootslang's shorts. At one point you have to watch her beat up Ariel for trying to escape and even strangle the gremlin giantess with her trunk as she places Ariel back in her own cell. The only time Clover stops patrolling the halls is to apply makeup and polish her tusks. That grootslang was as vain as a peacock. To you that explained why she didn't get along with Cree." But Clover's panties are tight on you and you're sweating like a pig. You even swallow some of Clover's stale sweat and begin to cough.

For a moment, Clover hears your coughing and the Grootslang giantess mumbles in confusion, you gulp as her ears twitch and duck back into her underwear. But Clover just lets out a sigh and shrugs her shoulders before walking away. You let out a sigh of relief and wipe your brow. That was too close for comfort.

It's gonna be a long day.
151212.title: Unnoticed by Clover

choices: Clover and her Roommates Find You
You Make it Out the Door
1512122.content:
After a long day of work, Clover gets ready to punch out with Destiny. You hide in Clover's panties and wait for your opportunity to escape once Clover gets into town. But as Clover is about to sign out, she sees Destiny waiting in front of her and you have to duck and hide deeper because Destiny looks mad. "Warden?" asks Clover. "Just signing out." Destiny crosses her arms and glares at Clover. "Clover," she says. "Cree found this in your lunchbox earlier. Care to explain?" Destiny holds out a bottle of beer and it reeks. The monster beer smells like burning rubber and you nearly pass out.

"But Warden," says Clover. "That's not mine. One of my roommates must've..." "Regardless of how it happened, I do not allow alcohol in this prison, inmate or staff. If I catch you bringing beer to work again, you're fired." Needless to say, Clover is in a bad mood as she walks out of work and makes her way down the mountain. "Diamond," she grumbles. "It had to be her. That lousy carbuncle! I'll bet it was her! When I get my hands on her..." But you didn't care, you were free. Clover was unintentionally taking you to freedom. But then you look down to see how high you were, stuck in Clover's underwear. A fall from there would be enough to kill you. You have to stay here for a while.

In no time at all, Clover reaches her home, which surprisingly is a large manor house that looked big enough for four people and you even let out a whistle before you stop yourself. Couldn't afford Clover hearing you. Clover walks up to the door and takes out her key, but surprisingly the door doesn't even open. Clover lets out a groan. "Marilyn!" she yells. "It's me, Clover. Did you like, change the locks again. That is totally lame." The door then opens up and Clover is facing a giantess the same height as herself.

This giantess is a red skinned behemoth, a type of monster resembling a hippopotamus with a dragon's skin. The behemoth girl has long orange hair and a spade tattoo over her right breast and she doesn't appear happy to see Clover. "You're late again." "Hello! What do you expect? I'm a guard, it's not like I can get out of the library at three like you Marilyn." Clover walks in and there's another monster on the couch, a giant kappa woman resembling a massive Galapagos tortoise with a purple shell with one heart shape in the back. The kappa girl is occupied watching TV on the couch as she turns her head.

"Uh-oh, someone's in the doghouse." "Shut up Shinzo," says Clover. "Marilyn, why did you, like lock me out. We're supposed to be roommates." As Clover is speaking to the behemoth woman, you slide down Clover's leg and roll under the coffee table before Marilyn can step on you. "Don't give me that lip," says Marilyn. "You deserve it for eating the humans I was saving for dinner." You then gulp because Clover wasn't the only predator under this roof. "What are you talking about? I didn't touch them." "But Diamond said..."

It is at this point you hear annoying laughter and a bright orange-yellow furred monster resembling an overweight mountain lioness with a crystal in her forehead walks down from upstairs on all fours. "You are so gullible Marilyn." "Diamond!" yells Clover. "You dirty Carbuncle! I was almost fired today thanks to you." Diamond just gives a smug look. "That would be doing you a favor hose face." Clover's trunk hisses as the Grootslang giantess gets all worked up. Shinzo the kappa shakes her head and starts to eat some kind of snack food from a bag. She drops a piece and it lands by you and you gasp in horror to see that it was a candied human skull. You definitely picked the wrong place to hide.

Marilyn lets out a sigh and then taps herself on the forehead. "This happens every single day! How am I going to make my famous human stock when I run out of humans before dinner?" "Well Marilyn," says Diamond. "What do you like expect? There are four carnivores under this roof." Shinzo blushes slightly and puts away her candy into her shell. "What I wouldn't give for a nice juicy human," says Marilyn as the dragon skinned walks back and forth. "If some people had more self-control." Diamond gives a smug smile and Clover glares at her. "Don't act so smug, you're as much to blame as any of us. I swear, you are like more annoying than Cree. You're the worst roommate ever." The carbuncle giantess just sticks her tongue out at Clover.

While everyone is distracted, you see that Clover forgot to close the door. You decide to make a break for it and run while Clover and her roommates don't see you. But can you get away in time?
1512122.title: Clover's Roommates

15121221.content:
Nope, sorry. Eventually one of the girls turns around and sees a human making a run for the door. This gets her attention instantly, and that girl was Clover. "That human managed to slip away. Looks like dinner is served." she thought right then, and then yells. "THERE IS A HUMAN HERE!!!!!" she yells out, and then Marilyn, Diamond, and Shinzo then turns to seeing you making a run for it with your life. "There is a human here, then we must get that human right now." Shinzo yelled right then, and then the other monster started getting up and then they head over to you. You screamed in horror as the other giantesses cornered you including Clover.

"Hold it right there human." Clover said just as the other monsters cornered you with their menacing heights and then tries to stomp you down to keep you from escaping. "Oh look, our dinner is right here." Shinzo smiled happily. "Marilyn, what do you think?" she asked right then. "I think he will make a good human stew." Marilyn said right then.

Clover then grabs you and then you, she, and the other 4 head to the tables as they prepare their meal, who is overall Wade who managed to sneak in and got caught.

What happens now?
15121221.title: Dinner is Served

15122.content:
You cling to the fur of the foot and look to see that the fur appears to be of a bright yellow orange color with black stripes. However, while it looked like a tiger's foot with the coloring and the claws, the toes themselves resembled those of a primate and you look up to see a Japanese style loincloth with a s swaying green snake's tail right above a pair of exposed bright red cheeks and above that is white fur.

There was no doubt about it, you had clung to Simone, one of the guards. Simone was a Nue, a Japanese monkey like creature with a tiger's limbs and snake's tail. She looked like a cross between a tiger and a baboon. Unlike Cree, Clover and Icy, Simone couldn't speak and chattered just like a monkey to communicate. Simone was chattering about as she walked down the hallway and looked around, pausing only to eat at a banana.

You gulp and try to hide beneath the fur. Simone ate humans, but only occasionally. While Cree, Clover and Icy ate humans like candy, Simone saw humans as only a sometimes food and usually stuck with fruit. She was more likely to bring you to Warden Destiny than eat you, but you don't want that happening either.

As Simone looks around, she climbs on the bars of a cell door and you have to hold on tight to avoid falling off. Inside the cell is a sleeping werecrab prisoner and Simone hisses before she jumps off the bars and skips away as you slip and have to cling between her finger like toes. That blasted monkey. You just hope you can evade Simone long enough to follow her home and escape this prison, otherwise your options are monkey chow or being whipped by Destiny.
15122.title: Mega Monkey

choices: You Reach the Door and Escape
151221.content:
As the day goes by, Simone doesn't appear to feel you. That doesn't necessarily make it a safe ride for you, because Simone is leaping across the prison and swinging through the bars as she makes her rounds. She just had to be a monkey based monster. At the end of the day, the nue woman punches out and you smile because it wouldn't be long before you're out of this hellhole prison.

Once Simone leaves the prison, you expect her to take the road that leads down the mountain. Unfortunately, instead Simone rapidly climbs down the mountainside, almost making you scream before you cover your mouth. Simone chatters as she climbs down the mountain. You don't dare look down, so you look up, but all you can see is the giant nue's scarlet red booty. You're disgusted. She just had to be a baboon with tiger limbs and a snake for a tail. It takes twenty minutes before Simone reaches the bottom of the mountain and heads for the forest, jumping through the trees, all while you hold onto her finger-like toes. Simone leaps through several more trees and you almost throw up before she lands at what looks like a verandah atop a treehouse like one you'd see in a Donkey Kong game. You're guessing that this is Simone's place.

Surprisingly, the nue giantess just opens the door, apparently it was unlocked. Why would she leave her door unlocked. You soon learn the answer because as Simone walks into the house, you hear more chittering but a higher pitch than Simone's. Then to your surprise, three nue children run up to Simone. One of them looked like a child version of Simone, another one had stripes over their monkey body but no stripes on their tiger limbs and the third one had black fur in contrast with Simone's white fur and white tiger limbs rather than the usual yellow orange. Because of their age you couldn't tell their gender. The nue children jump into Simone's arms as she hugs them. You're guessing that those smaller monkeys are Simone's children.

As soon as Simone's children hop away to the side, you jump off of Simone's foot and then see another nue coming, this time an adult male the same size as Simone that appeared to have longer fur than Simone as well as a slight mustache and thick eyebrows. This nue lets out a deeper chitter and Simone chitters back before walking up to the male hue as their tails wrap together in the shape of a heart. You're guessing that this was Simone's husband. From the sound of it, they didn't need actual words to communicate. Not that you understood monkey or cared. Your only thought was getting out of here, so you make a rush to the door. Sure you had to climb a tree in order to escape but at least you were out of prison.
151221.title: House of the Monkeys

choices: Icy Goes Outside to Fly Over the Prison
Icy Meets up with the Other Guards
1513.content:
As you feel around the foot, you look down and see that whatever monster you clung to was hovering over the ground at least one hundred feet. Then you see that this foot ended in talons like that of a bird and several blue feathers as big as you come down. You look up and see that you had hitched a ride on Icy.

Icy was a snowbird harpy, similar in appearance to an Articuno, but with an hourglass figure and a beaked face. She was still relatively new here, Icy recently graduated from high school and was hired by Destiny to work as a guard, that was just last week. As such Icy was still a little green and was easily the least competent of Destiny's guards. Not that it wasn't expected, the rest of the guards had to be at least ten years older than the harpy.

Of course you quickly climb the foot the hide in the feathers above Icy's knees. Icy may still be a newbie, but she was as dangerous as Cree and Clover. You didn't think a skinny thing like her could put away the humans, but you were wrong. What's worse was that Icy could generate extremely cold breezes by flapping her wings and could freeze humans solid. You once even saw her pick up a frozen human and lick him like a popsicle. You couldn't let your guard down around this giant bird.

Icy flaps around as she holds her keys in one of her clawed feet and was humming to herself before she hit her head on the ceiling and had to shake it off. "Ouch,' she says. "Okay, better be more careful about flying indoors. I can't believe this. I still can't believe I managed to hold a job for one whole week and such a sweet one. I wonder how Cousin Elle's doing in Horrorville. Oh, I hope I get to catch some humans trying to escape. Gee, I wonder if Cree and Clover like me. Simone's kinda cool, but those other two are scary. Wait, maybe I need to find out the names of the guards on the other levels. Hmmm."

You let out a sigh and continue to climb the feathered titaness. It was going to be a long day with her. Hopefully that bird won't find you, or you're sunk.
1513.title: Sky High Harpy

15131.content:
You continue to climb and after what seems like hours you have just made it to the Giant Harpy's Panties. you cant help but be amazed at the skimpiness of the giantess' underwear. even though she is still new it is already known that of the guards of this floor Icy is the least threatening one, at least as far as monsters are concerned, and some have gone so far as to say she is nice. but it would appear that this guard has a naughty side as well. as you look up you realize you have made a grave error in judgment, because beyond the panties is the waistline of the guards uniform. there is no way you will be able to slip through without Icy noticing your presence. however it would appear that fat may have given you an opportunity, as you ponder your situation you notice that the clumsy harpy has once again left her fly down, you could try and climb out through there and continue your journey upwards, although you would have to climb across her panties to do so, or you could turn back now and try a different approach. on the outside Icy begins to feel a slight tugging on her more sensitive feathers, "what could that be?" she thinks to herself. but before she can investigate it further her beeper goes off. "what is it now" she sighs as she retrieves the beeper from her back pocket and activates it. a message scrolls across the screen in bold letters "Prisoner Wade has escaped, be on high alert - Warden Destiny". "well well it would appear that I have an escapee looking to get in my pants"

Where does she find you?
15131.title: Icy Feels You Climbing Her

choices: Icy Sees You and Freezes the Ground
15132.content:
As you climb up Icy's talon, the ice harpy flies down the hall. You knew where she was heading. It was the area where the guards punch out at the end of their shift. She was going home. Perfect. You were so out of here. Of course, you had to climb up the inside of Icy's pant leg because in the same room was Destiny, no doubt checking up on Icy as Icy was punching out. "You're in a good mood, Icy." Said Destiny.

"Oh," says Icy. "Hi warden. I'm just very happy that it's been exactly one week since I started work at Under Gloom." Destiny just gives a stare Icy's way. "Don't get cocky just because you lasted a week. That just means you've proven yourself able to live that long. Remember, this is the most dangerous work environment possible. Too many things can go horribly wrong. In this job, your first mistake could be your last. You never know what the bastards could be up to, which is why you must be ready for everything." Icy nodded her head all while you were secretly moving your mouth to mock Destiny. She had to be the most uptight bitch you've ever met.

However, Icy shook hands with Destiny and was walking away. "I'll keep that in mind, Warden. See you tomorrow night." Once Icy was out of the prison, she spread her wings and flew over it, giving you a good view of below. You see all the inmates in the prison recreational yard and you even see a weremole guard overseeing Darcy as she's pulling weeds in the prison garden. "Sayonara suckers!" you call down from above, making sure that Icy didn't hear you.

Soon, the ice harpy was flying over Fearfield when she reached a small house in the suburbs.It looked like a dump but it was apparently good enough for that bird. Icy flies down and lifts up a lawn gnome, revealing the key to the front door underneath, which she uses to open the door. As she walks in, you see a mat that reads "Bless the Nest". Kinda tacky. Inside the house, you see several boxes that haven't even been opened yet. From the looks of it, Icy hadn't finished moving in. Unsurprising, she seemed like the kind of person who had just moved out of her parents' basement after coming out of college. You even see a cap and gown on the couch. The girl was more green than you thought. No wonder Destiny lectured her as she left.

And now the rookie made the mistake of bringing you out of prison into her house. You let out a laugh and survey your surroundings. You see a poster on the wall of a harpy resembling a thunderbird who was dressed like a DJ and working a turntable. Below it was a photograph of Icy with the exact same thunderbird, implying they were related. "I think I deserve a treat for making it this far on my first job." Said Icy as she picked up the phone and was dialing a number for the pizza place. While Icy is busy ordering the pizza, you try to survey any potential way to get out of here before the harpy knows your here and you see the only immediate way is out the front door.

Just as Icy is finished ordering her pizza, you make a run for the door. This was it, you were finally going to be free. But it would seem that destiny (the concept, not the gargoyle) isn't on your side because at that moment...
15132.title: Ice Punch Out

choices: Use a hidden phone to call in the crew
Find a air vent and use it to get out
153.title: more choices

choices: You are now on the road heading back to society
A guard comes by, and sees you and the crew
1531.content:
As you walk through the air vent maze to find a way out of there, you decide that this would be a good time to bring out your phone and call in the crew so you can ensure your breakout is successful. You call the crew awhile ago, and they thought that this was bullshit, as you intended this to be a prank, but somehow you got charged with murder and ending up having to go to prison over this preposterous thing. You were still mad that mummy girl ruined your car, and all you wanted was revenge, so you did it, and gone to jail for it, it was ton of bullshit that you ended in prison for this, and the crew said that they will be breaking you out of there. Your crew is some of the world's most elite prison breakout crew that is known to man, they make sure that you are out in no time, and that the enemies don't figure out where the fucking hell you are at.

You call the crew and they said "We are waiting outside the building, at the air vent, where are you?" the crew asked. "I am heading the fuck out of here today... I am just around the corner, will be there shortly." you replied. You continue your run until you reach the air vent, where surprisingly you see 4 humans your size, and a vehicle waiting for you for the break out. You run up to them, and they were glad that you got the fuck out of there, as they were waiting for like an hour, and had to use the invisible cloak nearly 5 times as guards were coming by.

"Where were you?" the crew member that look like (Ice Cube) asked. "Well... I was planning my exit route, since I am small as y'all folks, may as well use the air vents to get out." you replied, and the crew laughed. "Yeah... these dumb motherfucking monsters don't give a shit at all when it comes to escaping humans...." you laughed so much.

What occurs now?
1531.title: Time to get the fuck out of there

15311.content:
Wasting no time, you and your crew run into a car and the driver, a blonde man resembling Jack Atlas revs it up. "Step on it Rev," you say. "The sooner you're away from this nightmare the better." Rev turns the dial and you and your crew are zooming away. "We're out of here Wade," says the man who looks like Ice Cube. "Yeah." As your friends drive you away, you hold up your middle finger at the prison. "Good riddance Destiny. The next time I see you again, I hope it's at your funeral so I can spit in your coffin you old blue hag!" "You tell her!" yells another crew member, one in a pink shirt with shades. "Take that you big stupid Demona."

Soon, you and your gang of five are off on the road and heading to Fearfield to find someplace to hide. Unfortunately for you, Destiny knows you escaped and she's pissed beyond belief. "That weasel! He actually did it!" Lockette is cringing in her cell at the fear of the warden and Destiny clenches her fist as Belladonna smiles smugly. "None of the guards saw him, so that means somebody got past the infamous Warden Destiny. Bet your face is red right now Chief. Might be a sign that you're getting much too old for the...." Destiny grabs her manticore second in command by the throat and mildly chokes her. "Be quiet Belladonna," she says. "Or we're gonna need a new vice warden too."

Destiny lets go as Belladonna coughs. "You think you're so smug that you managed to escape. Congratulations Wade, you're the first person to get out of Under Gloom under my watch and the last. I think Bona Fete should change his attitude. Cree, Clover and Simone step back in fear and Cree actually gives a look of shock. "Bona Fete?!" yells Clover. "Not her!" Simone shrieks in fear and grabs hold of Clover. But Icy is confused. "Who's Bona Fete?" Cree gulps before she answers. "Death Icy. She's death itself."

(Thanks to Anonymous One for his character idea). Bona Fete is a 950 ft tall gargoyle with grey skin and black hair with a muscular figure. The woman wore all black with combat boots, kevlard pants and a chestplate with a Punisher style skull on it. Bona was infamous throughout the monster world for being the world's most dangerous bounty hunter. She's captured and killed all kinds of criminals from graffiti artists to terrorists and half the cells in Under Gloom itself were filled up thanks to her. Bona was a loose cannon willing to kill any of her targets no matter what they've done and has had many run ins with the police due to her harsh methods. What made her really scary was that her arms were covered with tattoos and she adds a new one for everyone she manages to kill.

Destiny knew Bona well because Bona's father was the same man who sired Destiny's own daughter. While Destiny didn't think much of Bona Fete, she knew the perfect way to punish you for trying to escape. You weren't as free as you thought you were.

As Destiny picks up the phone, she dials the number to call Bona Fete. "Say your prayers Wade. Dead or alive. Knowing Bona Fete, you're in serious trouble now."
15311.title: Bona Fete

15312.content:
A guard comes and sees you and the crew you guys hop into
Your vehicle choices are a 2000 Chevy Cavalier with a V4
A dodge charger fitted with the same V10 as a Srt10 Viper
15312.title: Your fate rests with the car

choices: You make a wrong turn and wind up over Destiny's office
You hear them bringing in a new inmate from Horrorville
You get out on the next floor down
1532.content:
You see an air vent up ahead and get an idea. You check to make sure none of the guards are around and you make your way up to the vent. "So long stupid monsters." You say to yourself as you slip inside the vent. The holes were just big enough for you to squeeze through. You begin to climb for you'd say, twenty minutes until you finally reach a pathway and gasp for air.

"Can't these giant creeps build shorter air vents?" You then begin to walk and you believe that you've found a way out. Unfortunately it was too dark to see and you had no idea where you were going. "Come on," you groan. "Come on, there's got to be a way out of this rot hole."

After thirty minutes, you continue walking down the ventilation system and then...
1532.title: Air Vent Escape

15321.content:
You keep walking down the ventilation system until you see light coming out of a vent with openings on the ground up ahead. You run to the light hoping to get a good idea where you were. This turned out to be a big mistake because you look down in dread at where you ended you. Below the vent you were in was a large desk with an old fashioned dial telephone on it along with a photograph you couldn't make out. But behind the desk were cabinets where they kept criminal records of all the inmates.

"You have got to be kidding me," you moaned. "I must've made a wrong turn." You were directly over the office of your archenemy, Warden Destiny. Destiny was a light blue skinned gargoyle who had to be at least a thousand feet tall since she was bigger than any other monster in the entire prison, staff or inmate. Destiny had long pinkish red hair reaching down to her heart shaped butt and an hourglass figure with huge curves. She had a lizard like tail, four horns on her forehead and bat like wings. In sort, she looked very similar to Demona.

It wasn't so much that Destiny didn't like humans. She's not racist. She just took her job as wardeb very seriously and had zero tolerance for anyone who tried to escape. Since that big blue bitch started working at Under Gloom, no prisoner has successfully escaped. Since you tried to escape more times than anyone else in the prison's history, Destiny had it in for you and every failed escape plan led to her punishing you harshly. One time she even forced you to rub her talons. If she sees you out of your cell, you're in serious trouble.

You hear the door open and Destiny walks in. "Crap." You mutter. As Destiny walks in, her ears twitch and she gives a scowl. You step back to be extra careful and Destiny looks up at the vent. Fortunately you get out of the way before she sees you. Destiny grits her teeth as she walks up to her desk. "That had better be a vermin problem," she says to herself. "Because I'd really hate to hear you tried to escape again Wade. After all the warnings I gave you. But you think you're invincible. If you've gotten out of your cell somehow and are trying to escape again, oh say your prayers. You had better say your prayers. Nobody is getting out of Under Gloom until they've paid their debt to society, if they can pay it."

You shiver in place and begin to sweat. Destiny didn't know you were right above her but was talking as if she did and even threatening you. This woman does not like you at all. Down below Destiny lets out a sigh as she takes a seat at her desk and begins to pour herself a cup of coffee as she resumes that stone faced look of hers. "Any minute now, Wade will try to escape, Belladonna will try to usurp me again. Man, I hate mornings."

You had to get out of here. It was way too risky to be above Destiny, but you see that you're on the other side of the vent and have to go back to find a different root. You run through the vent opening, but then you trip and start to fall. "Oh no," you think to yourself. "Not now. Please not now." But it was too late, you fall and slip through one of the holes in the vent opening and you were falling down. You hold your fingers as you plummet and hope that wherever you land Destiny doesn't notice you because if she does, you're dead meat.

Fate isn't on your side because as you plummet towards Destiny's desk you land...
15321.title: Above the Enemy's Office

153211.content:
As you plummet through the air, the only thing that goes through your head is "Please let me land on something soft!" This is a good news, bad news situation. The good news is, you do land on something soft. The bad news is, that something is Destiny's right boob. You bounce on her breast like a trampoline and land snuggly in her cleavage.

The force of your impact caused Destiny's breast to jiggle, which, unfortunately for you, she felt. She looks down at her chest, and instantly becomes infuriated upon seeing you. "WADE!" Before you can move, she picks you up between her thumb and finger, and holds you up to her face.

"I've just about had it with your escape attempts, Wade! This time, I'm going to give you special punishment! But first..." Destiny turns to her computer and pulls up your file.


Name: Wade Wilson

Crime: Arson, attempted escape 37 times

Sentence: 7 years


Destiny updates the escape attempts to thirty-eight, before returning her attention to you. "You're really in for it now, Wade. I'm putting you somewhere where you'll never escape, for the rest of your sentence. I'm giving you solitary confinement..."
153211.title: At Least You Had a Soft Landing

1532111.content:
You couldn't believe what Destiny said. Had you driven her to the brink where she'd actually eat you alive. "You don't scare me blueberry buns," you say. "Gargoyles don't eat humans." "Most gargoyles don't," says Destiny as she grits her teeth angrily. "But I've had it up to here with your escapes. How one human could cause so much trouble, I'll never know. Let's see you try to escape this prison!"

Destiny snaps her jaws in front of you and shows you her large fangs. You actually begin to cough. "Why bother Demona? Your breath is punishment enough. What have you been eating, the Bubonic Plague!" Upon hearing her least favorite nickname, Destiny explodes into a rage and roars directly at you as her eyes glow bright red. "How am I supposed to spend the rest of my sentence in your stomach you overgrown lawn gnome? I wouldn't last ten seconds with your stomach acids lizard hips."

You really tempted fate back there. Destiny opens her desk and then takes out what appears to be a shaker of green salt that she proceeds to pour over you. Some of it even gets in your eyes as you scream. "I bought this magic salt with you in mind Wade. It will render you indigestible and unable to leave my stomach for seven years. Once your sentence is up, I'll vomit you back up. You already make me sick so much that it should come easy. To be honest, I've never eaten a human before. How would you prefer to be eaten criminal."

This was not good. You truely had driven Destiny to the brink. If she, a creature normally harmless to humans, is ready to eat you, you really did make her mad. Now you had to pick your poison. There was still a way out of this, but it was very slim.

So how is Destiny going to eat you?

You watch as Icy and Simone dump your new cell mate in the pit. She lands with a thud. Looking, you realize that they've thrown Priscilla, the Orc sorceress, in with you. The two guards walk off, as Priscilla stands up.

"Ow. Damn it. And I thought that acid would work." She grumbles. Then she sees you. "Oh, hi Wade. You tried to escape too?"

"Yup. Would have worked too, if I hadn't landed on Demona's boob." You reply.

"Yeah, I tried to use acid to melt the cell doors and cause a riot, so I could escape unnoticed. It would have worked, had Cornelia not seen me."

You sighed. You hated Cornelia. She was the prison snitch. She was often the reason your escapes failed.

You see Priscilla thinking and looking around the pit, at the water and grass. "Wade, you said you landed on Destiny's boob, right?" She asks.

"Don't remind me." You reply.

"Well, that gives me an idea for revenge. The grass, water, and fish in the water are ingrediants to a potion that gives Lactose Overload Syndrome to werewolves, succubi, and gargoyles." She explains.

"Lactose Overload Syndrome?"

"It's a condition only those three monsters can get. It causes their breasts to grow insanely huge, and fills them up to the absolute brim with milk. The catch is, they can't lactate the milk, ever. And there's no way to reverse it."

"What are you saying?" You ask, now curious.

"I'm saying, as revenge, we can make Destiny's boobs so big that she can't move. The perfect revenge." Priscilla says.

That lovely R word was all you needed to hear. "Where do we start?" You ask.

Which part do you ultimately pick.

1532211212.content:
As you walk into the Rec Room, you immediately notice that Destiny really wasn't kidding about that stuff spreading like crazy. Currently, there were three inmates in the Rec Room and each was seriously larger than before.

First there was Elaine. The kitsune still retained her hourglass figure but was still bigger all the way around. She had just gotten lucky that her thighs and breasts had taken most of the damage. Her face and arms had puffed considerably and she even had a hefty paunch. Her thighs were huge, veritable hunks a fat and fur that pushed out in all directions. But it was really her breasts that stole the show. They had been huge to start with and now they were even bigger: obscuring her face and most of her upper torso. You couldn't even make out her shoulders anymore.

The next was Cornelia. Heck, she now resembled a blob that was so fat that most of her eyes were being forced either squint or close between her rolls.

Finally, there was Priscilla. The orc was pudgy beforehand and now the nebutori had only made things worse. She now sported thunder-thighs that supported a large, dropping bowling ball of a belly with bulbous breasts with a fatten face peeking out from between her cleavage.

But none of those facts were even remotely important. Why? Because the moment you walked into the room, they all turned towards you, their expressions turned murderous. You don't know exactly what they did next because the moment you saw those faces, you booked it on out of there! Considering the yelling and the their thunderous footsteps, you could hazard a guess or two.

"WHEN I GET MY HANDS ON YOU!"

"YOU LITTLE BASTARD!"

"I"LL BITE YOUR HEAD OFF!!!

You didn't even turn around at look and just continued to run.

153221121211.content:
You sighed in annoyance when one of the fattened hands managed to grab you. All those attempts to escape, and you'd meet your end at the hands of a bloated, hungry... uh...

You look up to see exactly which inmate caught you. To your slight annoyance, it was Elaine. You never did enjoy being around her. She was always too optimistic. Every time you got near her, she tried to tell you the benifits of being a prisoner, and that "things could only get better".

After grabbing you, she turned to the other two bloated inmates. "Hah. I got him. He's mine." You hear her say to Cornelia and Priscilla. "Too bad for you." Then she turned her head to you. "You're going to pay." Guess she lost her optimism when the nebutori hit.

The other two groan in anger and leave you with Elaine. She looks back at them. As soon as they are gone, she turns back to you, smiling.

"How'd I do? Did I sound angry enough? I think I did, cause it looked like they bought it." She said.

"Wait, you're not actually mad?" You ask.

"Of course not. Nothing makes me mad. Unfailingly Cheery. That's what my friends say about me. Either that or 'Stop smiling so much, you look like an idiot!' Anyway, I can think of so many positives about being fat. But not everyone else does. So, you are going to help me change that." Elaine replies.

"Me? Why me?" You are confused.

"Well, everyone thinks this is your fault and want to kill or eat you. And I know even without this, everyone hates you. So, I want to make you more popular. And to do that, we are going to..."

But you were beginning to tire, your legs and lungs burning from exhaustion. So focused you were on trying to keep ahead, you didn't notice that you had run into Dark Side. You didn't even notice that your chasers had stopped once they saw where you were you had gone. Because of all of this, you really didn't even think twice before scurrying under the first cell door you saw.

It was once you were passed the door did you allow yourself to stop, just laying on the floor, covered in sweat. Your chest was heaving trying to inhale as much air as possible. You don't know how long you were like that until you heard a voice.

"A human in my cell? Lucky day..."

Your eyes widen as you looked up from the ground and saw....
153221121221.title: Dark Side!

choices: You agree to her deal...there's too much to gain out of it!
Refuse! You'll find some way out of this mess and her grasp!
1532211212211.content:
Sitting on her cot, staring down at you with red eyes was probably the most infamous inmate in the entire prison.

Persephone was notorious for her cannibalistic habits and was fond of eating humans just as much. Even worse, she had a voracious appetite and if it wasn't for that muzzle on her, she would haven probably taken more than a few bites out of the guards and other personnel when they had to interact with her. All of this made her pretty intimidating to say the least, but truly, being in front of her in person was overwhelming.

It also didn't help that she was enormous. The nebutori had hit the others in the prison pretty hard but this was ridiculous. Persephone had become even larger than Destiny was after the nebutori and that still wasn't an adequate description! For one, she actually seemed to be taller than Destiny now! Her face, still muzzled, was surrounded by chipmunk-like cheeks swam in a series of multiple chins. Her chest was quite generous, each breast a large orb that rested on a gut. And what a gut it was! Persephone's belly had several large rolls and was almost was wide as she was tall. It went over her lap and slightly past her knees. It was big enough to almost completely cover her monstrous thunder thighs. Cushioning her was a rear that almost overflowed over the cot itself! All in all, Persephone was truly the largest monster you had ever seen and all of her focus was on you.

Before you could truly even process all of this, she was on you. With a speed that defied her size, she snatched you up and brought you to her grinning face.

"So, little human, what bring you here?" Her voice was surprisingly smooth, like silk.

You take a deep breath before answering. "I got chased in here by a bunch of the inmates."

Persephone's eyes widen at that. "So you must be Wade, then? I heard some of the guards grumbling about you and that nebutori. I mean, that's the only reason you get chased into Dark Side."

You nod reluctantly. There as no point in really lying. Simply put, Persephone was a psychopath and contradicting her, making her angry while in her grip would only get you a quick death.

Persephone grinned at you again. "So the whole prison has it out for you now?"

You frown. "And? I hate 'em all anyway."

"Yeah, I heard about that too. But what if I could make them go away?"

You stared at her for a few moments. "...What?"

"Look, I'll make you a deal, you get this muzzle off of me and get me out of here, so that I can go to town on the fattened smorgasbord out there."

Your jaw dropped. She wanted you to release her? Just like that? "And how do I know you don't eat me?" You asked. Did she really think you were that stupid?!

Persephone gave you a deadpan stare and held you away from her body. "Look at me." She grabbed part of her belly, held it up and then let it drop. "One measly little human is not gonna fill this up. Besides, I need bait."

You glared at her, but internally started to panic. "Bait?" You grounded out.

Persephone nodded. "I'm pretty fast but all this bulk is gonna slow me down. With all the prison angry at you, they'll chase you down like their lived depended on it. You bring them to me and I'll eat them. That simple."

"How do you know I won't just run away?"

"That's even simpler. With everyone out for your hide now? You've tried again and again to get out, just like the rest of us, haven't you?" She smirked at your silence. "If you couldn't get bust out of here normally, how are you gonna do that if EVERYONE want your head?"

You cursed in your head. She was right as much as it pained you to admit to that.

What Persephone said next drove the point even further home. "Think about it. You hate them, right? Well, get them to me, I'll kill them and eat them. I get fed, you get some payback and you get less monsters roaming around for you. It's a win-win. So what do you say?" By the time she was done, she was smirking at you again.

You thought about it. You already knew you could outrun almost all the monsters anyway, so if she turned on you chances were you could get far enough away before Persephone caught you. There was also the fact that she was right about the prison gunning for you. The less you had to deal with the better things were. There was even the bonus that you could some real revenge on monsters like Cree, Cornelia or maybe even Destiny! And with all of the commotion that would be caused by Persephone's killing spree, all the attention would go away from you anyway and lighten all the security.

Or.

She way lying and eat you the moment you got that muzzle off of her.

There was so much to lose but SO MUCH to gain. Could you really do this? Everything hinged on this. You steeled your resolve as looked into her smirking visage and gave your answer...
1532211212211.title: A deal with the white Devil?

choices: Someone's walking down the hall! Perfect!
No one's around. You've got to go somewhere else.
15322112122111.content:
"Okay, okay, I'll do it." You grumble.

Persephone smiled at you before lifting you up to the back of her head where the muzzle is fastened with a lock. Leaping to it, you find it is large for you to actually climb into it partway. Doing so, you set to opening the thing. You were pretty skilled at getting locks open in the human world and this is pretty much the same thing, if on a larger scale.

It took you maybe a minute before you cracked the lock and it came loose. Persephone quickly removed it and grabbed you again before tossing the offending object to the floor. She snapped her jaws several times at the air, as if testing them.

"Oh," She groaned. "That feels SO good!"

You roll your eyes at the display. Persephone doesn't notice and instead puts you to the lock on the door. You climb inside and, just like the muzzle, you get it to unlock. You peek your head out of the lock and see Persephone's hand-paw waiting for you. You hesitate for a second before jumping into it. She brings you up to her face, expression serious.

"Look, now that we got all of those pesky locks, this is what we'll do." She starts. "You'll go out there and stir up some trouble, get someone to chase you, you'll bring 'em down here to the cell door and I'll jump out and get them. Got it?"

You nod slowly. "Yeah, yeah?"

She glares down at you for a second. "Don't mess up or else..."

With the threat hanging in the air, Persephone lowers you down to the ground near the cell door. She opens it a little so you can walk out. Once your clear, she closes it again, ready to strike.

You walk down the hallway, ready to play your part. This is the best chance you got of getting out of here and you're prepared to do anything and everything.

What happens next?

You spot Cree and she's looking even bigger than the last time you saw her! She's taller and her belly is sliding against the ground as she waddles on one of her rounds. Normally, you'd be freaking out right about now but you welcome the sight. She'd make a perfect meal for Persephone and it allow you to get perfect revenge one of the monsters that always says she'd eat you. You hide your grin as she notices you.

You flip her the bird before turning tail and running back towards Persephone's cell.

"You'll never catch me, fatass!" You yell over your shoulder. You hear Cree snarl as she waddles after you, cursing at you. You keep throwing back insults and keep her talking, hoping Persephone will hear as you two near her cell. Cree looks at you in question before the cell flies open. Persephone lunges at the guard with a speed you didn't think she was capable of and slams into Cree with the force of a sledgehammer. Now, Cree is big but she's several sizes smaller than Persephone. The werewolf's greater bulk knocks Cree to the ground and before she can even react, Persephone is one her, her jaws closing for her throat.

As you watch the too struggle, it's clear Persephone will win but then she'll still need to actually eat Cree and that will take some time. You could wait and stick with the deal you and Persephone had planned. No matter what happens, you'll have at least raised your chances of getting out. Or you could try to make a run for it. Persephone is distracted and the death of Cree will probably cause a lockdown of the prison, lessening your chances of escape.

It's risk no matter what. What do you do?

It truly reminded you just how dangerous, experienced and downright vicious Persephone was. But that was part of the reason you were still following through with all this. Persephone made it clear that she wanted the fattened inmates and workers around the prison, but he knew she may turn on him. But if she was satisfied or just so downright full that she was unable to come after him then things would be worth it. Another obstacle out of the way and that much closer to freedom.

It was the sounds of snapping bone that got your attention and turned back to Persephone and Cree. Man, did you regret that. Persephone had finally gotten a to Cree's neck with her jaws and with her hands and wrenched back and forth until the werehyena's neck snapped before she finally started to dig into her meal.

1532211212211111111.content:
As you stood watch, Persephone devoured Cree's carcass. You don't know how long you were there, too focused on spotting anyone coming down the hallway.

"Mmh, that was good," Persephone moaned with her mouth full. "I'd prefer her cooked, that fat would be so flavorful if it had been pan-seared. One makes do with one has I suppose."

You nearly gagged at the thought of that but swallowed it back. "Are you done?" You ask hesitantly.

Persephone swallowed and licked dripping blood from her lips. "Yeah, I think I'm done with this one."

You took a deep breath and turned to look at the scene. What you saw didn't surprise you but it did disgust you. Persephone had utterly decimated Cree's stomach captivity. Skin and entrails were gone to the point that you could see Cree's spine. Cree's throat was also torn out and her arms and thighs were were missing great chunks. The only thing fully intact as Cree's face, her expression fixed in pain and terror.

Your hand flew to your mouth in an attempt to stem the dry-heaving as your stomach heaved. No amount of tv shows, Saw movies, or anything else could have prepared you for that! Turning away from the dead body and looked to Persephone. The werewolf's white fur around her hands and face were caked in blood. Menacing as that was, what really caught your attention was her stomach. The large mass of fat and fur had increased in size. Even with Persephone standing, it touched the ground and seemed to bulge outward with it's fullness, making her seem even larger. You glare in repulsion was Persephone licks her fingers and digits of the blood.

"Can you even eat anymore?" You ask.

At that moment, Persephone's stomach gave out what sounded like a growl of hunger. Persephone laughed and grinned. "Does that answer your question?"

You shake your head. She really was nothing but a psycho cannibal glutton. "So what now?"

"We move on and do it again. Just not here." Persephone motioned towards the body of Cree.

"Yeah...that would make things a little difficult." You think for a second. "But what happens if we run into more than one other...uh...victims?"

Persephone rolled her eyes at you. "Then I'll just kill them in rapid succession. THEN I'll eat."

She made it all sound so simple. You knew things would never go that smoothly. But that actually good. Once Persephone got in over her head, you'd run. A murderous cannibal on the loose in the prison would force everyone to either run to secure her or for their own safely, giving you more than enough chance to getaway in all the commotion.

Persephone slowly start to walk away and made motion for you to follow. You jog up to and then past her, remembering that you needed to act as bait again.

Simone is only given a moment to turn around before Persephone slams into her. Just like Cree, Persephone was using her superior size to knock Simone to the ground. Unlike Cree however, Simone just didn't have the same bulk, so when Persephone all but body slammed her she crumbled like a domino. Persephone's attack had left her smothering the nue with her weight but she would leave nothing to chance. The moment she and Simone slammed into the ground, Persephone's immediately went for the throat. Simone, the shock of the impact knocking all the air out of her longs, couldn't even raise her arms in defense before Persephone's jaws closed in on her throat. Unlike with Cree, Persephon did not wrench but instead clamped down with as much force as she could and pulled.

This time you are given no reprieve from the killing as you watch Persephone tears out Simone's throat, splattering blood on the floors, the walls and even you! You cannot stop the bile that rises in your throat and you bend over and puke. Persephone pays you no mind as she continues to her feast/assault. But this time her victim is still in the process of dying. Simone cannot help but try and reach from her throat in an attempt to stem the blood, gasping in pain all the while. Persephone shows no mercy, however. Even as Simone tries to reach her throat, Persephone takes the opportunity to take bites out of the nue's arms. All the while, Persephone is grinning with blood staining her face.

It takes Persephone far less time for the werewolf to eat the majority of Simone's flesh. The entire time, you cannot help but watch in horror, the sheer brutality permeating your mind. With Cree, you hated her, she tried to eat you and it helped that you didn't watch as Persephone devoured her without hesitation. But Simone, when it came down it, never tried to eat you. In fact, she would just report you to Destiny which was part of her job. You hated monsters, no doubt, But did Simone really deserve that? You couldn't figure out an answer. Instead you focused on getting out of there and attempted to stamp out any doubts..

Persephone turned towards you, blood still caking her face. She smiled, more pleasantly than anyone had smiled at you since coming to Under Gloom. She bent down and reach out to you with a pudgy hand-paw. You flinched and took a step back. That didn't deter Persephone. Oh, no! She was going to eat you! She-

Persephone gently patted you on the head. "Y'know, Wade?" She purrs, smile still in place. "This is the most fun I've had in a long time. And it's all thanks to you."

You give her a nod and a forced smiled. "Your welcome." You some manage to say that without stuttering.

Persephone smiles just gets larger before she pulls back and sits down on the floor just a little ways from Simone's corpse. She gently rubs her stomach.

You tilt your head in confusion. "What's wrong?"

Persephone gives a small burp. " Ate a little too much, too fast. Just need to digest for a few minutes. No point in throwing up all that meat after we worked so hard to get, right?" She gives you sidelong glance and a smirk.

You nod, though it is stiff. Things were spiraling out of control. Persephone was...she was...you didn't even know how to describe the creature you unleashed upon Under Gloom. You didn't know what she would do next or if you would even survive all of this. Even worse, you were covered in blood and once it got out that Persephone had killed and eaten two guards,..you were good as dead!

All you could really do was keep going and hoped this crazy plan actually worked!

Some more time passed and you drifted into thought until something bumped into you. Surprised, you turned to see it was a roll of fat from Persephone's fat. You pulled away and dismissed it, thinking Persephone had simply shifted. But then it happened again. You looked up at the werewolf and your eyes widened. She was getting bigger! Slowly but surely Persephone was expanding outward in all directions. It stopped after awhile but the werewolf had at least grew another third of her former size. You swallowed. Just how big was she going to get?! Persephone was a monster just by her behavior alone but now her body seemed to be growing to match that personality. Was it all the nebutori infected flesh that she had consumed?

You didn't get to ponder anymore as you felt fierce tremors through the floor. You turned to Persephone who was now getting up, her head looking in the direction behind you. You turned on your heel and faced whatever was coming. Whatever it was, it was big. Not as big as Persephone , but not that much smaller either.

The nebutori had hit her pretty hard as she, you noticed before wasn't too much smaller than Persephone. Most of her weight was concentrated in her belly and lower half. Her butt alone was the size of a small mountain range to you and her belly hovered just above the ground. You couldn't help but step back away from the werebear. But her attention wasn't focused on you. Instead, she was staring at Persephone. Ursula's one remaining eye was widened in shock and a little fear.

Persephone smirked at her, licking her lips at the sight before her. "Hello, meat."

But both Persephone and Wade were surprised when the werebear lunged at her. Persephone caught one of the Ursula's arms but took a swipe to face from the other arm. Persephone quickly swallowed the piece of arm and grinned at Ursula. Said werebear was trying to staunch the blood leaking from her arm. She glared at Persephone as the cannibal stalked a closer.

Persephone was all smiles. "Look how you bleed for me. Wet. Ready. Red. Wanting."

The white werewolf took to snapping at Ursula's injured arm, attempting to pull more chunks away. Ursula did a good job of swatting Persephone away but you knew that it was only a matter of time. While Ursula had left Persephone with some bleeding cuts on the face, the chunk of her arm that was missing was leaking blood and she was surely slowing down.

Persephone feinted going for another snap and when Ursula threw out her uninjured arm in defense, but that was exactly what Persephone wanted. In an instant Persephone bit onto the armed snatched a chunk out of it, just like she did before. Swallowing, she stalked closer to the all but defenseless Ursula, who was panting heavily with torrents of blood leaking from both arms.

You knew it was over. Ursula was a dead bear walking but she didn't give up. Instead. she took a page out of Persephone's book and attempted to take a bite out of her. However, she was sluggish and too slow and it was no surprise when Persephone leaned out of the way casually before going right for Ursula's throat. Persephone tore it out without hesitation.

As your companion, for the lack of a better word, helped herself to her feast, you resignedly turned around, your face in your hands, so that you didn't have to bear witness or be tempted to look at that horrific sight all over again. There was nothing you could do now. Everything was out of your control now. All you could was follow along and hope beyond hope, that you got out of here before all of it caught up to you...

You watched as Aria unwrapped a large sandwich she brought with her and start eating. You stifled a giggle as you looked at the onryo.

It was clear the nebutori hit her hard. Her stomach had bloated to bean bag chair size and had a number of rolls on it. Her hips and ass were filling up the entire couch. That hellspawn would never look for me there. I'm not even going to dismantle any more cars, just as long as I get away from Demona." But then Destiny leaps in front of Ariel and knocks her to the ground before letting out a Godzilla-style roar. Ariel screams on the ground and you're even sure that she wet herself in fear. The other inmates and even the guards look on in concern and Fate walks up behind Destiny to get a better look at what's going on.

"DON'T SAY, I DIDN'T WARN YOU ARIEL!" yells Destiny. "YOU'LL PAY FOR YOUR DISOBEDIENCE!" Destiny grabs Ariel by the tail and pulls it as the gremlin girl screams in agony. "Good grief." Says Clover under her breath. Cree even looks unnerved. Finally, Destiny pulls Ariel's tail so hard that it snaps off and Ariel screams. Fate is downright horrified. "Greg Weisman in a cardigan sweater!" yells Fate in shock.

It gets even worse. Destiny takes Ariel's severed tail as the gremlin is crying in pain and throws it down the garbage chute. She then growls at Simone. "WHAT THE HELL ARE YOU GAWKING AT! TAKE THIS PIECE OF **** TO THE PIT!!" Then Destiny turns to Cree and Clover who are shaking in fear. "AS FOR YOU TWO, CREE! YOU WERE IN CHARGE OF GUARDING ARIEL'S PART OF THE PRISON! CLOVER, YOU BROUGHT ME THE BAD NEWS! NOW THE PUNISHMENT!"

You and Fate both watch in fear as Destiny mercilessly pummels Cree and Clover. You've created a monster!
15322121312.title: What Have You Done!?

153221213121.content:
After Fate left (well, ran), the rest of the day in Under Gloom pretty much went as you had expected: an utter nightmare! Throughout the day, Destiny just seemed to get angrier and angrier. You didn't even think that was possible.

All of the guards and inmates were completely terrified of her. No one in the Dark Side had the courage to do anything when Destiny was near there. Elaine made sure to stay far away from her (though you guessed that had more to do with her being worried that Destiny's fire hair would melt her implants). Belladonna never even thought of insulting her after her beating. Even the normally tough Aria was on thin ice after her boobs accidentally bumped into Destiny and Destiny choked her out. In fact, the only person you didn't see afraid was the prison Doctor, but then again, she never showed any emotion. And even then, you just knew that she was terrified on the inside.

You also noticed something odd. Throughout the day, every time Destiny went berserk, which was now every second, she seemed to get more muscular. And her firey hair seemed to get longer and hotter. That wasn't all. At one point, Destiny cut her finger on a cell bar, and as she was embedding the bar in a nearby wall, you saw a drop of blood melt the floor. Her blood had literally become lava.

At the end of the day, every single person in the prison was beyond relieved when Destiny left to go home. Not you, though. You were still stuck in the necklace cage and your arms still hurt like crazy. You were honestly terrified at what Destiny was going to do next.

When she got home and opened the door (well, to be precise, she tore the door off of it's handles and threw it into space), you and her saw Fate there.
"What the f**k do you want, Fate?" Destiny asked.

"W-well," Fate started. You could here the terror in her voice. "I talked to B-Beth, and she s-said you might b-be possessed by W-Wrath."

Destiny just stood there for a moment. You looked up, and to your shock, her eyes, which had been blood red all day, reverted back to their natural color.

"Beth?" She asked, actually sounding calm and a little confused. "Why are you-"

Before she could finish, her eyes turned red again and she growled. "I see what this is!"

"Huh?" Fate asked.

"Belladonna put you up to this. Make it seems as though I've gone mad so she can take over. Well, when I get back to work, I'LL RIP OF THAT F**KING TAIL, SHOVE IT DOWN HER THROAT, AND MAKE HER DRINK HER OWN DAMN POISON!" She screamed. "Now, I'm going to bed, and if you wake me up, YOU WILL PAY!"

On that, Destiny went to her room, leaving a terrified Fate behind.
-----------------------
Later that night, Destiny was snoring in her bed, and the cage you were in was on the nightstand. You were thinking over the days events. You usually never thought or even cared about the consequences of what you did, but this. You had turned Destiny into a living nightmare. What had you done?

You look up and realize someone was looking at you. To your complete shock, it was...
153221213121.title: The Warden's Rampage

1532212131212.content:
It was Shelly. You were about to say something but she put her finger over her mouth and blew on her finger. "Not so loud, Wade," she whispers. "I didn't bust out of prison just to awaken the sleeping giant." "Look what you've done," you say. "You stupid turtle. You've made Demona over there 10 times more dangerous. She's more ticked off than ever. She even threatened her own daughter with violence." Shelly let out a sigh. "That's the spirit of wrath talking. It bonded to her soul and she's only going to get angrier and angrier." "That's impossible. Even Destiny can't get that angry. All that rage will be the death of her. Her heart will explode."

Shelly bites her beak slightly. "Actually, those possessed by the spirits of the 8 sins become immortal." You let out a groan. "Oh great. Now she doesn't just look like Demona. But that doesn't explain why you're here." Shelly shushes you as Destiny continues to snore away. "For some reason I actually feel remorse for my actions. If it weren't for the two of us messing around with that evil spirit, then a lot of this unpleasantness wouldn't happen." Shelly then starts to pick up your cage and tries to walk away. "All we have to do is get as far away from Fearfield as possible and maybe find some way to get into a different prison with a different warden and then we can break out from there and never have to worry about..."

"Excuse me. Am I interrupting something?" Shelly gasps and turns around to see Destiny glaring at her and gritting her fangs as her fiery hair erupts. Shelly screams and drops your cage before Destiny grabs her by the neck and causes her to gag. "YOU REPULSIVE REPTILIAN FLIM FLAMMER!! SO YOU HAVE THE NERVE TO BREAK OUT OF MY PRISON! I'LL BET THAT BACKSTABBING ALLEY CAT BELLADONNA PUT YOU UP TO THIS LIKE SHE TRIED TO USE FATE TO DISCREDIT ME!! LOOKS LIKE TONIGHT, I DINE ON TURTLE SOUP!!"

What Destiny does next horrifies you. She grabs Shelly by the front and back of her shell and tugs hard as Shelly screams in agony and then you hear a loud SNAP!. Destiny yanks off Shelly's shell as Shelly begins to cry and scream. "My shell! My beautiful shell!" Shelly tries to cover her exposed and heavily bruised breasts and back as her eyes water and Destiny violently stomps on her. Fate is looking at the scene through the bedroom door and is horrified beyond words and even runs off to vomit. Destiny then grabs you and Shelly and smashes the bedroom door before flying back to Under Gloom where she confronts Belladonna.

"YOU TRAITOROUS FELINE! YOU LET SHELLY ESCAPE SO SHE COULD MAKE ME LOOK BAD! TRYING TO GET ME FIRED AS USUAL, I SEE!!" Belladonna is shaking and steps back as Destiny pounds her fist into her palm and corners her. "I swear on my father's grave, Destiny," says Belladonna. "I honestly didn't have anything to do with this. Shelly must've broken out somehow when nobody was looking. I'm telling you the truth." "INSUBORDINATION WILL NOT BE TOLERATED, SOLANACEAE! TIME TO REMIND YOU OF YOUR PLACE!" You can only watch in horror as Destiny violently beats up Belladonna, at one point, trying to feed the manticore her own tail and forcibly making her drink her own poison, giving her a violent stomach cramp. Cree and Clover look in absolute horror and try to run but Destiny grabs them by their decks and beats on them, apparently seeing them just as responsible for Shelly's breakout. "I've created a monster." You say to yourself.

- - - - - - - - - - -

The next day, Belladonna is at home heavily bandaged from the beating. She's wearing an Elizabethan collar, a cast on her right leg, a brace on her left knee and a bandaid on her left ear. Her tail is heavily bandaged as well and she has a big swollen black eye and is holding an ice pack up to her jaw. Her older sister Astrid is there and is horrified with what she sees. "Destiny did this to you? And you weren't even plotting against her." Belladonna spat out a tooth and nodded her head. "I'm giving up. Her job isn't worth it. Starting on monday, I'm filing paperwork to be transferred to another prison. I'll just usurp the warden there. They can't possibly be worse than Destiny. She's always been hot-tempered but now she's acting like she's possessed. Oh." Astrid has to force her sister's mouth open to feed her her painkillers.

Back at the Daily Tombstone, Fate is at work pouring an entire sugar bowl into her coffee as she tries to figure out what to do. Cree's werejackal wife Aurelia stomps up to her and growls. "I have a bone to pick with you, Sirtis!" Fate lets out a sigh. "What is it, Aurelia." Aurelia then pokes Fate in her fat stomach as she berates her. "Last night, Cree came home with half her teeth missing and a twisted ankle. When I asked which inmate beat her so horribly, she told me it was your mother who did it. I have never seen such an abusive boss in all my life. What your mom did to my wife was barbaric!" "Aurelia," says Fate. "Mom can't help it. She's possessed by Wrath. And she already had a nasty temper to begin with so it only made her angrier." "Evil spirit or no evil spirit," says Aurelia. "I'm calling that attorney Kate Rowling in San Francisco." Aurelia walks away angrily as Fate lets out a sigh and Beth waddles her way up to her.

"I heard what happened last night. Ouch. Lexi's already assigned Tara to cover the story at Under Gloom." Fate let out a sigh. "I'll pay Tara's hospital bill. So what's the word, Bethany?" Beth bites her lip. "Your mom is only going to get angrier and angrier to the point where she'll beat the stuffing out of anything that so much as moves. Well, on the bright side, crime will be declining."

Suddenly Fate's cellphone begins to ring. Fate holds up the phone and checks the caller ID to learn that the caller is Destiny's younger sister, Fortuna. "Aunt Fortuna," groans Fate. "Oh boy. This is gonna get ugly."
1532212131212.title: Seeing Red

choices: Destiny, and she's even more pissed now.
Aria! Wrath was posessing her now.
15322121312122.content:
Meanwhile, back at Under Gloom, Tara had just started to investigate the incidents going on. And by investigate, we mean getting chucked through a window by the walking volcano that was Destiny.

"F**KING PAPPARAZZI!" Destiny screamed. "I BET THAT F**KING CAT BROUGHT HER TO DISCREDIT ME!"

"Um, actually boss, Belladonna's going to transfer to another prison on Monday." Clover said in a tiny, terrified voice.

"GOOD! SHE CAN BE SOMEONE ELSE'S PROBLEM!"

In the necklace cage, you were curled up into a fetal position. For once in your life, you were truly terrified. Tara had walked in and asked Destiny a question. As soon as Destiny saw the notepad, she flipped out. Hence Tara flying through the window.

All the guards in the prison had clocked out and bolted from the psycho warden. The only guards left were Clover, who was now rocking in a corner after getting yelled at, and Aria, for reasons you could only guess were very brave, or very stupid.

"Warden, did you really have to throw her out?" Aria asked, trying to stay calm but clearly worried.

"I DIDN'T ASK FOR YOUR OPINION, YOU PALE COW!" Destiny yelled.

It was then that you suddenly found yourself on the floor. Not knowing what just happened, you looked up. You realized you must have been knocked off, because Aria currently had Destiny in a choke-hold. From the looks of it, Aria was pissed off now.

"WHAT DID YOU F**KING CALL ME?!" Aria screamed.

That's when you remembered something. Aria hates being called a cow. Yuri called her a cow once, and it took both Cree and Simone to keep her from snapping Yuri's spine.

"ASSAULTING A SUPERIOR! NOW YOU'RE REALLY IN DEEP S**T, TAZEL!" Destiny bellowed before biting Aria's arm. When Aria let go, Destiny decked her in the face and clawed at her, tearing her uniform. Aria responded by grabbing Destiny and throwing her to the other end of the hall. She then charged and headbutted Destiny in the stomach.

"NO ONE! CALLS ME! A COW!" Aria screamed before thowing Destiny down the left hall. She then chased after her.

Clover shakily stood up and picked you up. "Great," she said, "Now we have TWO pissed off women fighting each other. I don't think the prison can handle it."

"Maybe if were're lucky, they'll rip each other apart. I wouldn't have to deal with them anymore." You say.

"Don't push it, Wade." Clover said.

Just then, you heard what sounded like a scream of victory. Clover raced down the hall to see, you in hand. Both you and her saw a red, muscular, fire haired figure standing over another, unconcious figure. The winner then turned, and you saw...
15322121312122.title: The Raging Fight

153221213121221.content:
Destiny stood over the beaten body of Aria. The defeated monster was bruised, scarred, and bleeding. Some of her teeth were knocked out and her one eye had a really obvious shiner. Destiny roared towards the sky, proclaiming her victory. If that roar did not scare anyone, what came next would. Wade and Clover watched as Destiny's body began to pulse and ripple. Her arms began to swell as her muscles grew. She inched taller as her legs lengthened and calves thickened. But not just her muscles grew. The horns on her head began to grow out, getting thicker and sharper as they advanced. Her tail began to grow small spines that looked ready to serrate whatever they hit. Her hands and feet grew longer claws. The fiery hair grew hotter as the fire in her eyes exploded. Wade could have sworn he saw smoke coming out of her mouth. Strangely enough her breasts grew with her expanding stature, guess to just make sure others knew she was female. What seemed like forever she stopped growing, much to the other's relief. But the relief was quickly burned away as the red gargoyle stared directly to the two. "CLOVER. WHY DO YOU HAVE WADE. IN MY CAGE?!"

She almost fainted from fear, but she only held the cage up, "I-It fell on the ground! I picked it up so it wouldn't...interfere with your fight...?"

The cage was grabbed, but Clover was slapped. This slap almost knocked her out but did knock her to the floor. A big red handprint was on her cheek. "DID I SAY YOU COULD TOUCH IT?! AND EVEN IF IT DID I WOULD HAVE WON! NOW GET OUT OF MY SIGHT BEFORE YOU JOIN HER! Clover ran off in tears. The gargoyle roughly placed the cage necklace around her neck, shaking Wade in the process. A faint groan from Aria signified that she was awake. Destiny quickly kicked her in her gut, "GET UP! NEXT TIME YOU PULL SOMETHING LIKE THAT YOU ARE FIRED! UNDERSTOOD COW?!"

As much as she wanted to, Aria could not fight again. She could only lay there and reply. "Y-Yes mam..." Destiny grunted in approval before angrily stomping to her office. She ignored the doorframe as her head crashed right through it, "AND GET SOMEONE TO FIX THESE F***KING HALLS!" Wade just sat in his cage, completely quiet and basically paralyzed by fear. He created more than a monster; he created a pureblooded demon that grows stronger, bigger, and angrier every passing moment. Her aggressive behavior was just getting worse. Now he was regretting every single moment he had ever taunted Destiny. Heck, he was even feeling sorry for causing that Mummy so much problems. Wade was actually now gaining a new outlook on monsters. He prayed that one would actually save him; but seeing how Destiny is, the chances of him leaving in one piece is to just keep quiet and hopefully get an early release.
153221213121221.title: Wrath Destiny

1532212131212212.content:
The next day was an absolute nightmare. Destiny was in such a bad mood that the first thing she did when she came in to work was break one bone in the body of every inmate. You couldn't bear to watch as Destiny tore out one of Lockette's teeth right before your former cellmate screamed and begun to bleed at the mouth.
