You weren't amused. Destiny made you clean up that mess all by yourself. If you it weren't for monster baking soda being more potent than normal baking soda, you would've been freed. Fate just let out a sigh. "Don't remind me. Wade has stressed my mother out so much that one more outrage could give her a heart attack." You smile at that. Just one more? You hope Fate's not exaggerating."

"Well," said Mazee. "Tim and I have to get going now. See you later Fate." "Bye Fate." Says Tim as he waves away. "Bye Xanatos." "So long, dummy." You think to yourself. It isn't long before Fate makes her way towards the guard room. Inside, there was another guard getting ready to leave. She was a brown haired monster resembling an enormous tan-yellow hippopotamus, except her skin looked like that of a dragon or a dinosaur. She was wearing a white version of Fate's outfit and from the looks of it, there was a tattoo of a skull on her right butt cheek sticking out of her crack. "Running late are we, Fate?" asks the pachyderm giantess. "I had some expected company, and unexpected company," said Fate. "David, this is my friend Beth. She's the day guard." Fate holds you up in front of Beth's hippo-like snout.

"Huh," says Beth. "Looks a bit feisty, not up to my standards but he's definitely perfect for you." You step back in Fate's palm. "What the hell kind of monster is she?" you ask. "A werehippo?" Fate lets out a snort. "What, haven't you ever seen a behemoth before?" "What's a behemoth?" you ask. “It’s a land based creature from biblical mythology,” says Beth. “Compare the leviathan. I hate leviathans. Well, nice meeting you David.” Beth starts to walk away and you keep looking to see her rump shaking and get a closer look at that skull tattoo. "I'd be careful around her," says Fate. "Beth has a fetish for dominating human men. The last time she had a crush on a human, she broke him." You let out a gulp before Fate puts you down.

As Fate takes her seat you look up to see tens of monitors from security cameras. And to think, Fate has to look at all those screens every night. You'd hate to have that kind of job. But at least Fate didn't know who you were. Speaking of which, she seemed to have her eyes glued to the screens. This could be the perfect chance to get away.
155131112.title: Dodged That Bullet

choices: You Miraculously Get the Riddle Right
1551311121.content:
Since Fate is distracted, you have your perfect chance to escape. You see the gargoyle giantess's tail wagging and jump out to grab it to swing down to safety. "Heh, heh," you laugh to yourself. "Eat your heart out Xanatos. Boy would Demona's face be red if she knew her dimwitted daughter helped me escape." You laughed it up as you ran into the hallway.

You smile and rub your hands as you look further down the hall. This was your chance to escape and then you make a run for it. You thought that you'd be out in no time. But you forgot one thing about these news studios. The way they were designed was like mazes in order to confuse criminals, like you. After half an hour, you let out a grunt. "Well, with any luck, Angela hasn't seen me. I doubt those cameras were designed to spot something as small as me. There's gotta be somebody who hasn't left yet."

You make your way to a desk near a door that read "Editor in Chief". At the desk was a sleeping tanuki woman who from the way she was dressed, was obviously the secretary. "Do tanukis eat humans?" you ask yourself. "Well, maybe she knows how to get out of here. "Hello!" you yell. "Hello!" However, the tanuki woman just snoozed away. "Hello!" you yell. "You lazy fatass! Wake up!" You let out a groan and then notice the tanuki woman was wearing earplugs. You slap yourself in the face.

Suddenly you hear a door opening and out walks a giant violet furred sphinx with long gray hair and large feathered wings. She was wearing a lavender business suit and a pair of glasses. However, what was really bizarre was that instead of walking on only two legs, she walked on all fours. Unlike other monsters, sphinxes walked on their hands and feet just like animals. Freaks.

Then you remember something, that must've been Lexi, the sphinx boss that Fate warned you about. You step back as Lexi turns to her secretary. She shook her head. "Asleep on the job again," she complained. "If good secretaries were easy to find, you'd be so fired Kiki." That's when Lexi sniffed the air. She turned around and saw you trying to sneak away before she let out a purr. "Well what do we have here?" asked the sphinx. You try to run but Lexi jumps out and lands in front of you before licking her lips. "Crap!" you yell.

Lexi begun to circle you like a shark as she begun to drool. "I haven't eaten a live human for some time. But, that means I have to ask you a riddle. Tell me, what's your name?" Lexi licked her lips. You couldn't tell her you real name. Perhaps if you continued the masquerade, you'd be able to intimidate Lexi into leaving you alone. "I'm David Xanatos, bitch." You say.

However, Lexi gives a smirk that makes you shiver and shake. "Xanatos eh?" she says. "If you're really David Xanatos, you should be clever enough to solve my hardest riddle." "Crap." You groan. Lexi smirked before she extended her claws. "I'll make a deal with you, Xanatos. You know, a lot of monsters, especially gargoyles, aren't particularly fond of you. But I'll make you a deal. Answer my riddle correctly and I'll let you live. Answer incorrectly and you become part of my thighs." Lexi grins and shows you her razor sharp teeth.

You let out a gulp. Destiny may be a bitch but at least she doesn't try to eat you. You should've stayed with Fate. But you stare down Lexi and grit your teeth. "Hit me with your best shot Hello Kitty." You say rudely. Lexi smirks before asking the riddle. "There is a place where I see everything, it's the very same place where I hear every ring. This place I retreat to all of the time, is the very same place where I thought up this rhyme. Where is this place?"

You're sweating bullets as Lexi wags her tail and looks at you with hungry eyes. It's now or never.
1551311121.title: Sphinx Happens

15513111211.content:
You're sweating bullets as Lexi wags her tail and looks at you with hungry eyes. Damn!

Lexi's riddle kept repeating in your head: There is a place where I see everything, it's the very same place where I hear every ring. This place I retreat to all of the time, is the very same place where I thought up this rhyme...where could that be? Her office? Since she was there all the time, it made sense, but you weren't sure.

This was unsettling enough with this jigsaw puzzle of an old lady looking down at you and licking her chops. But this just had to be the hardest Riddle she knew! Riddles made your head hurt!

Wait a minute...

"You're head?" you say, asking it more like a question. Crossing your fingers that you were right. You didn't bust out of prison just to get eaten!

The giant violet furred sphinx blinked and then scowled. "NO!"

Wha...? Did that mean you? YES! You resist the urge to taunt Lexi.

Lexi regarded you, looking annoyed. "Well, guess you are who you say you are, Xanatos We sphinx have a very specific code we have to follow with human prey: we can only eat those who get our riddles wrong, if we don't limit our human prey to that..." she shuttered, then begrudgingly jerked her head in giving you permission to pass her. "Since you got it right, I'm not allowed to try eating you from this point onwards...you're free to go. Also, be careful of some of the employees here, human-eaters."

You nod, feeling smug. You loved ticking off monsters. Maybe that was why you even enjoyed your failed attempts to escape Under Gloom: making Destiny crazy. You walk past the Sphinx. Feeling you were on top of the wold right now. You were out of prison, and had gotten out from under Destiny's nose later because of her own dimwitted daughter, and you had just outsmarted a monster that planned on eating you.

Damn you felt good! Now all you had to do was find the way out of here and you were set! After a few hours of wandering around, you spot what looked like a door leading out of the building.

All of how good you were feeling as things going so smoothly crashed to the ground when you failed to notice a huge shadow pass over you and you suddenly crash into something and fall on your back.

"Well well, what have we here?" a huge voice asked.

Looking up, you see what you hit was a giant foot. One of the monsters that worked here.

Only question was, who was it? As much as you hated her species, you actually hoped it was Fate. That would be the best option for your safety, but you REALLY hoped it wasn't Cree's....ugh!...wife, Aurelia!
15513111211.title: You Miraculously Get the Riddle Right

155131112111.content:
You hear an evil laugh that sounded similar to Cree's but sounded a little lighter. You gulp and then look up in pure horror. Like the shadow of Anubis, Aurelia, Cree's were jackal wife is looking down on you with hungry eyes... er... eye. and drooling. "Looks like Mazee isn't hear to save you now, my little... hey, wait, you're not Tim!" Aurelia squats down to get a closer look at you as you step back. You're betting that Cree told her about you, but with any luck Aurelia wouldn't recognize you. But then she'd probably still eat you. Aurelia tries to focus her good eye on you and then you run to the side with her maimed eye before Aurelia lets out a snarl.

You run up ahead but Aurelia jumps in front of you and growls, prompting you to run to the side. Unfortunately, Aurelia leaps in front of you again and gives an evil laugh. As you keep trying to dodge Aurelia she keeps easily keeping up on you. "Damn!" you yell. Aurelia was way faster and more agile than Cree. Then again, it made sense since she didn't have several thousand tons of lard weighing her down. Aurelia licks her lips as she looks down on you. "You might as well give up," says the jackal giantess. "I'll be eating you soon my salty boy."

You begin to sweat and then you notice a hole in the wall and bolt just as Aurelia is about to grab you. The Anubis-like titaness lets out a growl and tries to run after you, but you hide in the hole. She lowers her head down and you get a good view of that messed up eye. You wonder why she'd use her blind eye to look in for you but then again, she was probably trying to scare you. You don't see it, but outside, Aurelia is cracking an evil smirk. You look out and then look around and see that jackal is nowhere in sight. "Stupid dog." You say to yourself.

You run out immediately thinking that you've won, but then you gag as a furry hand grabs you. You look back to see that Aurelia was squatting on a chair that she placed over the hole in order to fool you. This was just great, not only was Aurelia faster than Cree, she was also smarter.

"Game over." The were jackal says as she opens her mouth wide.
155131112111.title: You're Screwed!

choices: You Slip Out of Aurelia's Pocket and Onto the Bus Floor
Aurelia Reaches Her Apartment (You're Staying for Dinner)
1551311121111.content:
It looks like Aurelia is going to eat you when her good eye focuses in on you. "Hey," the jackal giantess says. "Wait a minute. That face, you're Wade aren't you." Uh-oh. Looks like Aurelia's got your number. Maybe you can try and trick her and save your skin.

"Wade? Uh, no, I'm David Xanatos." "And I'm Dr. Drakken," says Aurelia sarcastically. "There's no way in hell Xanatos would've fallen for such a simple trap. What kind of a moron do you think would believe you?" Aurelia sniffs you and you're sweating in fear at your main predator's mate and then you impulsively punch her in the nose.

Aurelia pulls her head back and rubs her nose as she glares at you. "You're just as ballsy and stupid as Cree said you were," she says with an evil smirk. "Well, I guess I can't eat you. You see, Cree and I have an understanding. I don't go after you and she doesn't try and eat Tim." Well, that was a relief. At least the unlovely couple won't attack each other's prey.

Then you gag as Aurelia squeezes you tight and makes you scream. "But that doesn't mean you're off the hook," she says as she shows you her teeth. "My shift is over and Cree's will be in half an hour. You're joining us for dinner." Aurelia laughs and then places you in her tool belt before walking away.

This was just terrific. Where was Fate when you needed her? With your luck Fate probably overheard what Aurelia was saying and since Aurelia was A) Her coworker and B) Married to one of her mother's underlings, it's doubtful she'd believe you over somebody she's known for years.

You hear the sound of a bus coming and it appears that Aurelia is taking the bus home. You figure that Cree and Aurelia don't own a car so she has to take the bus. Now would be a perfect opportunity to try and get out of the tool belt while Aurelia was distracted. But will you be able to get out?
1551311121111.title: You're Double Screwed!

choices: Someone Appears on a Security Camera
155131112112.content:
You turn to see a set of purple talons and look up to see Fate bending down to pick you up. Her eyes are glowing red to allow her to see in the dark. That's probably one of the reasons why a gargoyle like her was made the night guard. "There you are, David," says Fate still believing your ruse. "You could've been eaten. What if Lexi or Aurelia were to see you."

You let out a scoff. "No sweat. I already out smarted that oversized pussycat." Fate just gives a smile. "I should've known you of all people shouldn't have any trouble with riddles. But I better take you back to the guardroom to keep a closer eye on you." You want to complain but you remember you have to keep up the ruse of being Xanatos. Otherwise Fate will realize something was up. As much as you hated her for being A) a gargoyle and B) Destiny's daughter, you had no choice but to be pleasant with her. And that was going to kill you."

Back at the guard room, Fate places you down and continues to watch the security screens while sipping from a cup of coffee. You see a photograph of her as a child with Destiny and even then Destiny has the same stern gaze you've grown used to. Not surprising given that she had to raise Fate alone and was working at Under Gloom even then.

"You know," you say to Fate. "Your mom sounds real uptight to me." "Unfortunately," says Fate. "Mom has always had trouble with stress. Which leads one to wonder why she chose to work in a prison of all things. But that's gargoyle instincts for you. Most of us get jobs in law enforcement or rescue work. It's that desire to serve and protect that has etched itself in our genes."

"B.S." You think to yourself. Then you clear your throat. "Is anyone else in your family that messed up." "Actually," says Fate. "No. Well not really. Mom's sister, Fortuna is actually the exact opposite of mom, temper-wise." You gag. Destiny actually HAS a sister? What an ugly horror she must be." Fate then gives a laugh. "Ironically, Aunt Fortuna has a husband who is also named David. Kinda funny. Mom of course doesn't like him that much but she at least tolerates him. After what my father put her through, she's become the biggest misandrist I know. If she's told me once, she's told me a million times, "Men are Poison". By the time I'm ready to date, she'll be dead."

You let out a laugh at that but you figured at much. There had to be a reason why Destiny gave you the hardest time of all. You start to think that no man would get near Fate if it meant having that barracuda as a mother-in-law. "Does your Aunt Fortuna have any kids?" "Just my cousin, Pearl," says Fate. "Pearl seems to have inherited mom's temper and then some. The thing is, you've probably noticed that gargoyles are among the biggest monster species in existence." That you knew. Destiny was the biggest monster you've ever met. Fate then sighs again. "Pearl is an exception to the rule. She was born with a growth disorder and is abnormally short for a gargoyle. She's less than half my height and she's already old enough to drive."

You mentally laugh. Sounds like a female version of Lexington. It also sounded like Pearl was much like one of those annoying chihuahuas. It's always the smallest dogs that had the big bad attitude.

"So," you say. "You have a cousin but what about brothers and sisters." "Just one half-sister." Says Fate uneasily. You raise an eyebrow. "After my dad abandoned my Mom, let's just say history repeated itself with another gargoyle and that resulted in my younger sister, Bona."

Suddenly that name rang a bell. "Bona?" you ask. "As in Bona Fete." Fate groaned and anxiously bit into a donut. "Don't remind me. That girl is the most reckless, ill-raised gargoyle I've met."

You couldn't believe this. Fate's sister was Bona Fete. Bona was the most vicious bounty hunter in the monster world. She was a loose cannon who wouldn't hesitate to kill her targets whether or not their crimes were even that serious. She was a muscular gray skinned gargoyle with black hair and dressed up like the Punisher. Her arms were covered in tattoos, each one for a criminal she killed. You really hope that Fate and Bona weren't that close.

What happens now...?
155131112112.title: It's Fate

choices: You run into Harley, Emma, and Tara
1551311121122.content:
As you grumpily sat on the desk, looking at the monitors, you see something in one that makes you freeze and you let out a yelp of horror.

Someone had pulled a motorcycle into the parking area...a 950-foot tall muscular and gray skinned gargoyle. She wore a chest plate with a Punisher-style skull on it with kevlar pants and combat boots and had black hair. Tattoos covered her arms that looked like the faces of a family tree.

Bona Fete.

Ho SHIT! That loose cannon bounty hunter who was known to kill any target no matter what their crime was! Destiny had called in that psychotic bitch?! Ho, you didn't think it was possible to hate Demona any more than you already did, but this takes the cake!

What was she doing here?!

Fate, looking at you, followed your line of sight and when she saw the screen you were looking at. When she saw who was being shown on it, she paled.

"Wha...wha...wha is SHE doing here!?" Fate sputtered, then looked down at you. In seconds, before you know what had even happened, her hand had swooped down and she was holding you in front of her face.

"David...for the record, I'm really sorry!" she said before stuffing you down her shirt and between her boobs.

Once you shake off the vertigo and realized where you were, you felt disgusted. But you hear the door to the guard room shatter as the sound of a gunshot rang through the air. Ho right...the alternative was WAY worse than Fat'es cleavage. As much as you hated it, you were safer here.

"Yo Fate! How's it goin'?!" Bona said loudly.

"Bona...you...you just SHOT the door off the frame! You could've used the doorknob!" Fate shouted.

Bona scoff, "Too boring. Anyway I got something to show you." she said they you hear something rumaging from a bag and Fate lept back with a yelp.

"Wha...wha...what the HECK is THAT, Bona?!" Fate cried.

"Head of a Laistrygonian Giant that was caught littering rather than tossing a gum wrapper in a trash can. Should've SEEN how much blood there was when I put one in the bozo's neck to separate their head from the rest of their body! It was great!" Bona said with relish to her half-sister.

You felt Fate shudder and you actually agreed, damn psycho! Hell must be freezing over, because you agreed with Destiny on something: Bona Fete was a menace! The fact that SHE wasn't in Under Gloom herself was a sign of just how messed up this was! No wonder Fate had hidden you in the first place she could think up on short notice!

"That's...uh...that's good shooting." Fate said, trying to hide her Nashua at what she was seeing.

Bona smirked at her part-sibling, and then leans forward and licked Fate on the cheek, making her shutter. That was all it took for the earthquake-like vibrations, added onto the jerk backwards from earlier, to send you tumbling out of Fate's shirt and you hit the ground.

Unfortunately, the more deranged gargoyle noticed you first.

"Eh? What's with the bug?" Bona asked, seeing you. She squinted and leaned over you to get a better look, "Ho...human, same difference." Then she grinned and raised a foot over you "STOMPY-STOMP TIME!"

"NO!" Fate screamed, and tackled Bona, shoving her away from you and they both fell over.

You blink. Did Fate just...save your life? No way! Monsters DON'T protect people!

Still...as you hide under the desk, and watch the two gargoyles wrestle, you found yourself worried about Fat's well-being.

"Ho come one! Its just a human! There's tons of the things! They populate this world in great numbers, thriving regardless of the circumstances or conditions and are incredibly resilient. However, unlike ants, humans are greedy, selfish, backstabbing liars who would sooner kill you than help you-especially if they thought doing so would benefit them. What does it matter if I kill a few hundred, or even a few million of their kind? They'll grow back soon enough!" Bona shouted.

You can't help but wince at that. The psycho bounty hunter had unknowingly pegged you.

"You're WRONG! That's not how humans are! Besides, you kill anyone over anything just to make a few bucks! You're hardly one to talk! And you call yourself a gargoyle?!" Fate shouted.

Then she saw you out of the corner of her eye, "Run, David!" Fate shouted as she grappled with her half-sibling.

You knew it made sense, but it didn't seem right to leave Fate to deal with this freak on her own. Wait...it doesn't seem right? Since when did you worry about that?!

"I'll get help!" you promised and bolted out the ruined door.

As you did so, you thought the world must be going mad. You? Help a monster? And Destiny's daughter, no less! Still...

After a few tense moments of fruitless searching...
1551311121122.title: Good, bad, and world gone mad

15513111211221.content:
You see a shadow and realize that there is somebody in the hallway. Unfortunately, that somebody is Aurelia and she appears to be growling with hunger. "Oh goody," says the jackal giantess as you scream. "Fresh meat!" You immediately run the other way with a scream as Aurelia chases after you.

"Crap! Crap! Crappity crap!" you yell. Unfortunately for you, Aurelia is much faster than Cree is, mostly due to weighing far less than Cree. "You don't smell like Tim," says Aurelia as she comes forward. "But I'll enjoy devouring you, nonetheless." You jump as Aurelia reaches down to growl when you see the broken down door to the guard room and then slip inside the guard room as Bona and Fate are still fighting. At this point, Fate has pinned Bona to the ground and Bona is struggling under her much heavier sister just before spotting you.

You see that Bona is still holding onto her gun and then she smirks as she points it at you. "David!" yells Fate. "Get out of the way!" You step back as Bona manages to roll over and pin Fate before taking aim at you as you scream. At this moment, you hear Aurelia's footsteps. "You gotta be kidding! How did Tim break this door down? I'm gonna have to stay here extra hours..."

As Aurelia walks in, Bona raises her hand slightly, obviously mistaking her for an enemy and fires her gun as Fate gasps. The next thing you hear is Aurelia screaming in pain before a loud thump that creates an earthquake that sends you tumbling across the ground.

You roll across the floor and look forward to see Aurelia unconscious on the ground. Fate looks up in horror as Bona gets up off of her and bites her lip. "Oh dang." "Aurelia!" yells Fate. Fate runs up to the unconscious werejackal and then feels her pulse. "She's still alive," she says. "No thanks to you, Bona." "Come on," groans Bona. "You are not blaming this on me, Sis." "It's COMPLETELY your fault, you trigger happy creep!" yells Fate. "I'm calling an ambulance."

As Fate takes out her phone, you come to a horrible realization. You just got Cree's wife shot. When she hears about this, you're dead. You look and see that Aurelia's bullet wound looks dangerously close to her spine and she appears to be bleeding rather heavily. This was so not good.

You hear Fate as she's on the phone. "That's right," she said. "We're at the Daily Tombstone. One of my coworkers was shot by half-wit half-sister when she tried to go after a human. We need immediate attention." You couldn't believe this. You actually hope that Aurelia recovers. Imagine how dangerous Cree would be if she was angry.

Speak of the devil, you hear more footsteps and a familiar looking obese shadow comes forward. "Aurelia?" asks Cree. "Are you in here Aurelia?" You start to bite your nails nervously because there is absolutely no way that this could end good. Cree walks into the guard room and steps in some of Aurelia's blood right before she looks down and looks in absolute horror at her unconscious wife. She has a look of genuine fear and you can even see some tears of despair in her eyes. "Now, Cree," says Fate. "Remain calm."

"AURELIA!" shouts Cree as she lifts Aurelia off of the ground. "Aurelia!" You never thought you'd see Cree cry. It was kind of scary looking at her when she was like that. "Stay calm, Cree," says Fate. "Help will be on its way." Cree lays Aurelia's unconscious body on one of the chairs in the guardroom as she continues to cry. She then turns around and gives Bona a glare.

Cree growls and is just about to attack Bona but before she could do anything, Fate grabs hold of her. "Cree! No!" Cree lets out a growl. "Let me at her, Fate," says the hyena giantess. "I'm going to murder that trigger happy creep who hurt my wife!" Cree is snapping her jaws at Bona as you nervously try to walk away. "Whatever," says Bona as she walks out of the room. "I'll just leave you to take care of the jackal girl. I actually came by since there was a bounty head in the area. See you later, Fate."

Bona walks out the door just as Cree lets out a snarl. "Let it go," says Fate. "The important thing is that Aurelia is still alive." Cree looks at Aurelia and is deeply worried. But then she notices you and then her eyes pop out. "You!" she yells. You scream but Cree runs in front of you and lets out a growl. "I'll bet that you're just as much responsible for this. Fate raises a brow as she sees Cree zeroing in on you.

"You two know each other?" "Know him?!" yells Cree. "That's Wade!" You gasp because it seems the cat's out of the bag. "Wade?" asks Fate. "But he's locked up." "Locked up?! Fate, you idiot, he's standing right here." "No," says Fate. "That's David Xanatos." Cree just looks in disbelief. "David Xanatos?" she asks. Fate just crosses her arms. "I'll admit, Aurelia chased him into the guardroom. That's why she got shot. But don't you think that with your wife in mortal peril, you wouldn't be trying to make an excuse to eat a human." Cree gives a growl as Fate leaves the room to wait for the ambulance.

As Fate leaves, Cree grabs you and squeezes your body. "You little bastard," says Cree. "You nearly got my Aurelia killed." "Lighten up you dumb cretin! It's your bitch's fault for running after me." Cree certainly didn't like that bitch comment and digs her claws into your side. "Listen here, Wade," says Cree. "You're going to go into that wound and take out the bullet because if you don't, I'll tell Destiny about your little escape.

You gulp. What a revolting development that this turned out to be. Cree places you to the wound and you shiver in place. You almost decide not to go in, but you hear Cree growling and it looks like you don't have any choice in the matter. You crawl into the wound and react in disgust as you crawl through the blood stream. "Gross, gross, gross, gross." You groan as you move through jackal blood." You soon reach the bullet.

The only problem is that the bullet is the size of a truck and you have to get behind it and push, all while Cree is holding Aurelia's hand. This just plain sucked. You were now forced to go inside the wound of a giant unconscious werejackal all to extract an oversized bullet. It takes a lot of effort but eventually, you manage to push the bullet out and then you gag before you slip and fall all the way back down deep into the wound.

As you're looking around in disgust, you hear the sound of Fate coming with at least three monster paramedics. "There she is," said Fate. "That's her."

How do you get yourself into these messes?
15513111211221.title: Oh Crap!

choices: The Girls Come to Your Rescue
15513111211222.content:
You stop just as a white furred foot is about to step on you. It looked like you were in luck. Three of Fate's coworkers stayed after hours after all. Tara the Two-Faced vampiress, Harley the wereboar biker and Emma the polar werebear. You let out a yell to get their attention. Emma squints slightly as she spots you. "Tim?" asks Fate. "I thought Mazee took you home already."

"Emma," says Harley. "Get your ojos checked. That's the human that Fate was carrying around." Tara just gives a hiss your way. "Good," she says. "I need a snack." "Fate's in trouble!" you yell. "Bona Fete is in the guard room."

"BONA FETE!" all three of them yelled at once. "Aye carumba!" yelled Harley. "That gargoyle is loca!" Tara hold her head. "Why isn't SHE in Under Gloom." "We'll worry about that later," says Harley. "Andale!" Harley picks you up and places you on her shoulder before running on all fours as Tara and Emma follow her. You hold on tight to the wereboar woman's fur and start to gag. Harley smells absolutely horrible. You doubt she's taken a shower in the last ten years. Then again, she's a pig so the smell shouldn't be a surprise.

"Bona Fete is nightmare incarnate," said Emma. "I heard that she killed a hydra for armed robbery and ate its tongues in shish kebob." "She's Fate's half-sister right?" asked Tara. "Si," said Harley. "From her no good papa that left mama Destiny holding el huevo." Emma let out a growl. "Congratulations," she said. "Now the womanizer has the daughter he deserves. I wouldn't be surprised if the little horror hunted down and turned the bastard into a fountain of blood."

By the time the three of them reach the guard room, Bona has Fate in a headlock and Fate is biting on Bona's arm. "Get your teeth off me you purple fatty!" "You're the one who started the fight you sick bitch!" yells Fate as she tries to break free of her half-sister's grip." Harley then lets out a snort and loud oink as she tackles Bona and knocks her off of Fate. This knocks you onto the floor with a grunt before Emma lets out a growl and charges forward.

Emma tries to grab Bona but due to her bad eyesight, she grabs Fate by mistake and pins her to the wall. Bona gets up and Tara hisses as she flies into the air and kicks the gargoyle to the side. "Emma!" yells Fate. "Get off of me! It's me, Fate!" Emma gets off of Fate as Fate gives a glare. "Wear your glasses you silly old bear. That's what the doctor told you."

Bona turns her head and faces Tara before gagging at the sight of her half-burned off face. "Ugh," she says. "What happened to you? It looks like a Midgard serpent ate your face. Tara hisses and bites Bona in her wrist to make her bleed as Bona yells. However, Bona counters Tara by holding a gun and spraying water into her eyes. Tara screamed and held her eyes. "My eyes!" she yelled.

"Huh," you say. "Must've been holy water." Bona scoffed. "You're not the first vampire to try and sink their teeth into me," she says as she turns around and reveals a tattoo of a dying vampire on her back between her wings. As Tara is in pain, Harley jumps up and lands butt first in Bona's face. But then Bona grabs Harley's curly tail with her teeth and then jerks her head to slam the boar giantess into the wall. Harley oinks loudly and then Emma puts Bona in a literal bear hug and drives her claws into the gargoyle's chest.

But Bona slaps Emma to the side with her wings and then whacks her in the face with her boobs to knock Emma on top of Harley. "Try that again," said Bona. "And I'll tear you up into a million pieces of ugly bear and then sew them back together to make a rug." Then Bona sees you trying to walk away and takes out her gun as you gasp. "Don't think that I forgot about you."

You scream as Bona shoots at you and nearly blows you to pieces with a bullet. "Dance bugger dance!" yells Bona as she fires too more times and you have to run down the hall as the giggling giantess follows after you. "Crap! Crap! Crap! Crap!" you yell as you dodge gunfire.

As you're screaming in the hallway, Fate realizes you're in trouble. "Oh my gosh," she said. "Bona is going to kill David Xanatos." Harley oinks in confusion. "How is that a bad thing, chic?" Emma let out a grunt. "I'd hate to be a human right now. Fate, where are you going?" "She's my sister. Maybe I could reason with her." "Bona Fete is madness," says Tara. "You can't reason with madness. You lure it in the back of your truck and shoot it! Sometimes I can't believe the two of you are even related!" "But she's right," said Emma. "Come on!" As the girls rush off, Tara lets out a grunt. "I hate humans," she said. "Why am I doing this? And for Xanatos of all people? I should have my head examined.

Bona keeps shooting at you and even breaks a few windows. "Haven't you heard of overkill?!" you yell. "No," said Bona with a slasher smile. "But it sounds like fun." It isn't long before Bona has you cornered and you scream. You have your back to the wall as the gargoyle stomps forward and has a smile on her face that spells out death.

"I'm warning you," you say trying to intimidate Bona. "You don't scare me. I'm David Xanatos." Unfortunately, Bona is anything but intimidated. "Ooh," she says. "David Xanatos? That's gonna look good on my resume." Bona lowers your gun and you're now scared for your life as she points it at you.

Only a miracle could save you now.
15513111211222.title: Bounty Hunter Out for Blood

155131112112221.content:
Bona is just about ready to shoot you, all while smiling fiendishly. "If you really are who you say you are," says the gargoyle as she lowers the barrel. "Then this will be a public service." You scream as Bona is about to pull the trigger, but before Bona could kill you, she lets out a scream and misfires into the air blowing out the lightbulb because Fate snuck up behind her and pulled on her hair. "Leave him alone!" yells Fate. You immediately make a run for it as Fate tries to hold down her half-sister.

However, Bona bites Fate's finger and makes Fate groan in pain before Bona steals Fate's taser and uses it to stun Fate. "Protecting Xanatos?" asks Bona. "You oughta have your head examined, sis. Oh well, time to kill the human." Bona fires at you several times and manages to shatter the windows as you're screaming to get away. "What is wrong with that woman!?" you yell.

Bona runs after you again and then she takes out what looks like a grenade and throws it in your direction as you hide under a cubicle. The grenade goes off and blows the cubicle to bits. You're sent screaming into the air as Bona flies up and then snatches you up in her claws as you grunt. The gargoyle giantess squeezes you tight and then smiles viciously as she holds the barrel of her gun to your head. You're now legitimately afraid for your life and bite your fingers as Bona swings the barrel on her gun. "Any last words, Mr. Xanatos."

"Screw you." You say weakly. That's when Bona stops and smirks. "Good idea." Bona puts her gun away and then she takes out a cordless drill that she turns on. You let out a scream because this was obviously going to be way worse than being shot to death. You even begin to cry because it looks like Bona would kill you. You couldn't believe this, you broke out of Under Gloom just so some psychotic gargoyle bitch could kill you in the most vicious way possible.

You close your eyes and wait to be drilled to death, but suddenly there is a loud THUMP noise and Bona drops the drill to the side as she collapses to the ground still holding onto you. It looks as though something or someone knocked Bona to the ground. "You damn bounty hunter," says a familiar voice. "What the hell are you doing here?!" You gasp because you recognize that voice and don't like the person it's attached to.

You look up and see Destiny of all people looking down at Bona and you begin to sweat and even try to grab some of Bona's hair to hide yourself from your blue nemesis. If Destiny saw you out of Under Gloom, you were in big trouble. "Geez!" yells Bona. "Don't have a minotaur, Demo..." Destiny then stomps on Bona's back before she could finish her sentence and causes Bona pain.

"Causing all this trouble in my daughter's workplace," says Destiny. "I ought to lock you up. I could see the gunshots from the clock tower. Half-sister of hers or not, if you've harmed her in any way, I swear...." Suddenly Destiny spots you hiding behind Bona's hair and gets curious. She then lifts Bona's hair up and realizes what's going on. She snatches you up and gives a glare at you.

"Wade!" she yells. "I'm gonna..." Before Destiny can harm you, Fate walks in. "Mom?" she asks. "What are you doing here?" Destiny turns and faces her daughter. "Fate," she says. "Thank goodness I'm alright." "You can thank him for that," says Fate as she points to you. "He got Emma and Harley to help me when Bona went berserk." Destiny was actually surprised upon hearing that and then stares at you. You lower your head.

"But Fate," says Destiny. "This is Wade." Fate looks in disbelief. "Wade? Mom, you've been working so hard that you have Wade on the brain. He told me his name was David Xanatos." Fate is shocked to hear that and you can briefly see a flash of extreme anger on her face before she returns to her surprised expression. It seems that Destiny couldn't believe that you of all people would save her daughter from that psychotic bitch.

How do you get yourself into these messes?
155131112112221.title: Miracle or Catastrophe

choices: With you and Fate after her shift
With Destiny and Bona at Under Gloom
1551311121122211.content:
Fate put her hands on her hips as she looked at her mother, "Mom...stop and think: Can you REALLY see someone that's as much of a anti-monster racist, a misanthrope and a nihilist as Wade Wilson going out of his way to help a monster--especially me, seeing as I'm your daughter--from an utter psychotic like Bona?" the younger gargoyle asked reasonably, giving her mother a look.

Destiny blinks, looking at you in confused shock again, then looked at her daughter, then you again before you and the two conscious gargoyles all share a look...then burst out laughing. Even YOU had to admit it sounded like a joke, and you'd just done it!

"So...what do we do with the trigger-happy demented bitch?" you ask once you three all calm down, looking at Bona Fete.

To your shock, Destiny actually nods in agreement with your opinion of her bastard child, "I've got a Cell in the Dark Side of Under Gloom that she's gonna go in...should've crammed her into it a long time ago, now that I think about it." she grunts, then smirks "maybe I'll give her Wade as a cellmate...those two'll be a match made in Hell, but I'd find it funny to see Bona end up falling for him and forcing him to marry her in prison like that!" Destiny cackled deviously.

You pale for two obvious reasons at that, 1) the idea that Bona would consider you her type and marry you, and 2) Destiny finding out you'd busted out!

"Mom!" Fate snapped, then smacked her mother across the face, "nobody deserves that! You're starting to loose it with how Wade's been making you crazy! Besides, you're scaring David!" she complained.

Destiny looked at you "Sorry," she relented, "and trust me, I know...the idea that there's somebody that could pass as Bona's type IS frightening." she admitted.

With that, Destiny stuffed you into a pocket on her shirt, then she starts bending down, only to stop when Fate got her attention. "Actually, mom...could you give me David back? I don't want him near Bona." the benevolent one of the sisters said.

"WHAT?!" Destiny shouted at the top of her lungs.

"Mom...seeing as how he got Emma and Harley to help me when Bona went berserk, can you please just give the idea of a guy being around me the benefit of the doubt, just this once?" she sighed, sounding tired. Clearly, this "no guys" thing was an exhausted topic between them.

Destiny sighed, then pulled you out of the pocket and dangled you in front of her face, "All right, Fate. But one thing I want David here to know...you try ANYTHING to my daughter, and you'll wish I would've let Bona finish you off, got it?!" she snaps at you.

"I'm not that stupid!" you yelp. Sheesh...this angry/protective mom-mode is scarier than any fit you'd ever caused Demona before!

Destiny smirked, "Good then, we understand one another.", with that you're transferred from one gargoyle to another before she bends down and hauls Bona Fete over her shoulders and drags the psycho out. You smirk, enjoy Under Gloom, bitch!
1551311121122211.title: Acting OOC Can Save Your Butt!

15513111211222112.content:
At that moment, Destiny had returned to Under Gloom, carrying Bona Fete and was walking down the hallway to put Bona in a suitable jail cell. "Geez, Des," says Belladonna. "I know that you don't like Bona, but isn't this a little harsh." "Shut up, Belladonna," says Destiny. "This literal bastard nearly got my daughter killed." "Isn't Fate technically a bastard as well." Destiny makes her eyes glow red to get Belladonna to shut up before she tosses Bona in a cell and makes her groan. Belladonna then grit her teeth nervously. "Aren't a lot of inmates here in Under Gloom because of Bona?"

As Bona was recovering in her jail cell, it was revealed that she wasn't alone in her prison cell. Behind her, there was a female vampire with glowing gold eyes and gray hair worn in a crescent moon shaped mohawk. She spotted Bona and hissed. "Oh," she said. "I've been waiting for this, you tattooed piece of trash. After you humiliated me and nearly killed me outside of the Terrordale First National Bank." The vampiress tried to strangle Bona, but Bona gave a smirk, turned her head and bit her cellmate's thumb right off as she shrieked. Bona spat the digit at Belladonna and Destiny's feet before smiling evilly at the vampire criminal. "Need I remind you who put a loser like you in here," says the bounty hunter. "While I'm here, I might as well do some damage control so Big Blue doesn't have to spend the whole government budget feeding society's trash."

Destiny gave a grumble and grabbed herself by the face before she turned to Belladonna. "Belladonna," she said. "Please sedate that maniac before she kills all the other inmates." Belladonna nodded her head and stung Bona to make her fall to the floor in pain. "Cree!" yelled Destiny. "Clover! Get your butts down here! We have a new inmate for solitary confinement!" While Cree and Clover were dealing with Bona, Destiny was walking down the hallway, growling to herself as Belladonna followed.

"I see you are flustered, Destiny," said Belladonna smugly. "Might I recommend yoga?" "I'm not in the mood for snarky poison lionesses, Belladonna," warned the blue gargoyle warden. "Fate is out there with a boy." Belladonna let out a laugh. "Oh boy, I wouldn't want to be him. Didn't you chase away the last boy to try and ask Fate out with a gun? Why aren't you giving this one a hard time?" Destiny let out a growl. "Because he saved Fate's life. But I can't help but think that guy was Wade trying another escape. But Wade would never risk his neck to save a monster, especially not a gargoyle and especially not if that gargoyle was my daughter." "Huh," said Belladonna."What was his name." Destiny gave another growl. "David Xanatos." Belladonna looked in confusion. "Isn't he already married?"

Before Destiny could say another word to Belladonna, she looked into your jail cell to see Lockette looking nervously. She tried to look further in and Lockette tried to obscure her sight but Destiny eventually grabbed Lockette and held her down as she inspected the cell. It wasn't long before she blew her top. "Where's Wade?!" she yelled. Lockette looked nervously at Destiny as her eyes glowed bright. "I don't know," said Lockette. "I haven't seen him since last night." Destiny roars in anger. "I knew it. That was Wade back at the Daily Tombstone! That little..."

Before Destiny could finish her sentence, her eyes popped and her eye twitched before she let out a muffled scream of pure frustration. "What's the matter now, Blue Lips?" asked Belladonna. "Wade or no Wade," said Destiny. "He still saved my daughter. I... I... I can't even figure out what to do. I can't... I..." Destiny then slapped herself in the face and grunted. "Well," said Belladonna. "Think about it this way. Once you're his mother-in-law, you can torment him whenever." Destiny legitimately didn't have any idea what to do and Belladonna wasn't helping. She was about to deck Belladonna, but instead punched the wall and let out a groan. "Belladonna," she said. "Shut up."

Now we cut to you and Fate...
15513111211222112.title: Destiny in Doubt

15513111212.content:
You're busy trying to think as the sphinx giantess purrs. Lexi shows you her claws as she gives you a smirk. "So, my little morsel," she says. "What is it going to be, Xanatos." Lexi snaps her fangs and smiles evilly at you." You don't have time to think about the riddle so you just have to hope for the best. "Uh," you say. "Your office." You smile nervously and cross your fingers, hoping that that is the correct answer. However, you look in fear as Lexi breaks into hysterical laughter and even holds her chest. A laughing sphinx is never a good sign.

"I always thought Xanatos would be smarter," says Lexi with an evil smirk. "You have answered poorly." You gasp and Lexi laughs wickedly as she licks her lips. "You know what that means don't you?" You gasp as Lexi lets out a growl and starts to inch closer to you. You couldn’t believe it! You were going to be eaten. Dammit. You broke out of Under Gloom and hitched a ride to an escape by manipulating Destiny’s own daughter, only to wind up being cornered by a giant and hungry sphinx. This was not happening, this was not happening. Lexi even let out a sinister laugh as she closed in on you. “You know,” says the sphinx. “I don’t get to chomp a human that often so I think I’ll have some fun, Xanatos.” She said that last part mockingly just before she gave a nasty giggle. “I’ll give you a minute’s head start. Good luck.”

You waste no time running as Lexi wags her tail. You run around the corner as the sphinx is looking at her wrist watch and smirking. “Tick tock, tick tock, tick tock. The clock is ticking.” “Damn!” you yell. You run down the hallway into a cubicle area that fortunately for you was empty. You hide behind a cubicle and pant. As you stop to catch your breath, you look and see Lexi’s shadow. The sphinx was coming and because she never stood up, she was closer to the ground than other monsters and could catch you easier. Lexi licked her lips again. “I wonder what Xanatos tastes like,” she says. “I’ll bet he’ll be spicy. Look out specky, here comes Lexi.”

You scream as you try to slip out. As much as you hated to admit it, you hope that Fate shows up. As much as you hated gargoyles, you had to admit that their drive to protect humans from actual threatening monsters made them tolerable. But then again, this was no ordinary monster you were hiding from. This was Fate’s boss. Lexi nearby is sniffing around for you. “Now,” she says. “Should I eat him here or take him back home to cook him. I haven’t had grilled human for ages.” You had to get out of here so you look back and run around the cubicle to the next as you maneuver through the office maze. Unfortunately for you, news buildings were designed like mazes to confuse criminals that came in so you don’t know whether or not you’re safe. You soon find yourself drawn in a corner and your only escape has a shadow approaching. It could’ve been Lexi but what choice did you have. You ran out and sure enough the monster in front of you was....
15513111212.title: You Lose

15513112.content:
"You have to stay here and out of sight," says Fate. "Once I'm dressed for work, I'll get you. Above all, don't let Mom see you, David. She hates men. If she saw you in my house, she'd blow her top." "You don't know the half of it." You say under your breath. Once Fate leaves the kitchen you begin to shake and hope that she comes back soon. You do not want to be stuck here with Destiny. She hates you enough. If she caught you in her daughter's house she'd be furious. Heck, if she found out you saw Fate's panties, she'd put you through a shredder.

All you had to do was lay low in the kitchen. Suddenly you hear stomping. "That was quick." You say as a shadow appears in the room. The good news was that it was a gargoyle's shadow but unfortunately it was too skinny to be Fate and you quickly realize who it is and gasp. As Destiny walks into the kitchen, you quickly hide behind a swimming pool sized sugar bowl and she passes by you.

Destiny stops in her tracks and you take a deep breath as her ears switch and she turns her head. You begin to sweat as Destiny gives a skeptical look, but fortunately she turns her head back. "I could've sworn I heard something," the blue gargoyle giantess says to herself. "I highly doubt Fate has a rodent problem, so maybe it's... easy Destiny, get a hold of yourself. That Wade has halfway driven you off the edge." "Good." You say to yourself.

Destiny groans and holds her head. From the looks of it, she had a migraine. Since you came to Under Gloom, she's been getting enough of them to put Rita Repulsa to shame. The next thing you know, Destiny is brewing herself a cup of coffee and while the percolator is running, she rummages through one of Fate's cabinets and takes out a bottle of what looks like aspirin. "WTF?" you ask to yourself. "Who keeps aspirin tablets with their food?" That was practically asking for trouble but given how stressed out Destiny usual is, Fate probably prefers to keep some headache pills handy in every room. You lean back to try and get a better look at Destiny so as to avoid being seen but then you slip and grunt as you fall into the sugar bowl.

Thankfully, Destiny hasn't seen you yet and once the coffee is ready, she puts two aspirin tablets inside and sniffs it. "Could use a little sugar." The giantess says to herself. SUGAR! Oh, that was bad. Without even looking, Destiny reaches into the sugar bowl, forcing you to try and get out of there just before...
15513112.title: Dodging Destiny

1552.content:
You looked at the clock and remembered that it was visiting hours, where friends and family of inmates could visit and see how they are doing. Since you had neither, you never got a visitor. But this gave you an idea. You could hitch a ride on one of the visitors and get out that way. Smiling, you head to the visitors center.

The visitors center was surprisingly empty. Usually is was packed. You hid behind a trash can and looked. You could only see three visitors: a vampire talking to Darcy, another kitsune talking to Elaine, and a blue succubus sitting in front of an empty booth. Deciding the first two would get you spotted, you went for the succubus.

You make your way over to her and start climbing up her shoe, which thankfully had an untied lace. You were almost to her ankle when you heard a voice.

"I was wondering when you'd show up."

You look up to see the succubus staring at you. You gulp. You're up s**t creek without a paddle now. She bent down (not easy, since from the looks of it, she had Lactose Overload Syndrome) and picked you up. She set you down on the counter and smiled.

"You caught me. Big whoop. So what, you gonna turn me in?" You ask, angry.

"Yes, but not just yet. I actually came to visit you." The succubus replies.

You were honestly surprised. "Really? I never get a visitor."

"Yeah, I'm here because I have a deal for you. I can get you out of this prison."

Your jaw dropped. She could do that? You'd be free? "How?" You ask.

"Simple. I'm a succubus. So I can use magic to give you whatever you want. But I'll want something in return, at a later date. Just say the words."

She barely finished her sentence before you spoke. "I want Destiny to let me out of this prison. I want her to decide I don't belong here."

The succubus smiled and snapped her fingers. "Done. In a few moments, you'll be a free man."

You could almost jump for joy. Finally, you'd be out of this hell hole. You were so happy you didn't care that the succubus had told Cree, who was nearby, you had escaped. Cree walked over and picked you up.

"Why are you so happy?" She asked.

Before you could answer you both heard a voice.

"Stop, Cree."

You both turn and see Destiny in the door. When you saw her, you saw that she looked...
1552.title: Let's Make a Deal

15523.content:
For some reason, Destiny had an odd look on her face. You saw it before but couldn't place where.

"Warden Destiny, I found Wade trying to-" Cree started.

"Leave Wadey alone!" Destiny yelled.

You couldn't wait. Destiny would make Cree drop you and-

Wait, did she just call you "Wadey"? That's when it hit. Now you remember where you saw that face. It's the face Bebe gives you! The succubus made Destiny fall in love with you!

Destiny walks up and pulls you from Cree's hand.

"Come on, Wadey. I'll take you from her." Destiny said.

You felt sick. You turned back to the succubus, who was grinning. Destiny walked out of the visiting room with you in hand, leaving a dumbfounded Cree behind.

"...Wadey?" Cree finally said.
-----------------------------
OK, so where does the lovesick Destiny decide to take you?
15523.title: This Will End Badly

choices: Destiny Comes Down in an 80s Style Outfit
155232.content:
Destiny continues her lovestruck smile as her eyes looked somewhat dazed and she was humming as she wagged her tail and carried you. For your part, you couldn't believe this was happening. Destiny, your most hated enemy, the one who hated you with every fiber of her being, was stone cold in love with you. You mentally vomit and glare at that succubus as she gives a laugh and then teleports away. You're too incensed and horrified to even speak.

At that moment, Belladonna is walking by and then gives a smirk. She doesn't see the look on Destiny's face but she does see you in Destiny's hands and comes to the conclusion that you were in trouble yet again. If only she knew. "Well, well, well," says the sneaky manticore. "Caught Wade trying to bust out again, did you." Destiny let out a giggle ignoring Belladonna. "Actually," said Destiny. "I've decided that Wadey's paid his debt to society and I'm taking him home. By the way, I'm punching out early today. You're in charge for the rest of the workday." Destiny hums to herself and leaves Belladonna utterly confused. The manticore had to manually shut her jaw with her hand and then she looked at the bottle of orange soda she was drinking. The manticore dropped the bottle on the ground and held her head. "I must be sick.

Destiny at that time reaches the outside of the prison. You rub your hands. This was it, you were finally out of Under Gloom. Now, you just needed to find a way to get away from Destiny. But before you do so, Destiny squeezes you and giggles as she pulls you up to her smiling face. "Hold on tight, Wadey." Destiny then slams you between her massive breasts and you grunt as she opens her wings and jumps off the ledge to fly through the air. You give a moan. "I think I liked it better when she hated me." You mumble to yourself. You try to wiggle your way out of Destiny's breasts but it's futile and you're in too deep. It was just as well. You look up to see that you were hundreds of miles above Fearfield and the fall from that height would kill you. But is it any worse than having to deal with a lovesick Destiny.

Destiny squeezes her breasts and lets out a giggle before she swoops down and lands in front of her house. Your jaw drops in horror. "Oh ****." You mutter. Then you gasp because you hope that Destiny didn't hear you and get any ideas. "Here we are," says Destiny in a singsong voice. "We are going to have SOOO much fun." You grunt and try to break free but Destiny squeezes you out into her hand and takes you inside.

As Destiny lays you on a table, she uses her tail to shut and lock the door before she walks around humming happily. You look around for any sign of a way out but it's completely useless and then to make matters worse, Destiny pulls down the shades on the windows and laughs to herself. You really wish that you never met that succubus. "Wait right here, Wadey." says Destiny as she shakes her rear in front of you. "I need to slip into something more comfortable." Destiny blows you a kiss before retreating upstairs.

Destiny walks upstairs and you begin to dread what's coming. "Damn that succubus," you say. "If I ever see her again...!" Before you can say anything else, things get much worse as....
155232.title: Things Escalated Quickly

choices: Being beaten by your drunken father
1553.content:
You decide to just wing it, and make up your escape you go. But as you're stepping out of your cell, a voice from behind you says "Don't even try it. " You turn around, and recieve the shock of your life, as you see yourself dressed in a white suit standing behind you. "What the hell? Who are you, and why do you look like me?"

The other you smiles. "Let's just say I'm your conscience, your guardian angel if you will. I've been trying to get through to you for over thirty years now, and I think I speak for everyone when I say it's high time you cleaned up your act."

"What are you saying?"

"I'm saying you need to change your ways and serve your time, or else. "

You scoff. "Or else what? What'll you do, you're just an hallucination. In fact, why am I even talking to you? " Your so called guardian angel sighs. "I suppose I should have expected this, you always were a thick headed and stubborn one. I should know, I've been watching you your whole life."

Suddenly, instead of a prison cell, the both of you are standing in a hospital room. A woman lay in a bed with a bundle in her arms. You turn to your conscience and ask "Where are we? " "Where do you think? This is the day you were born. " You turn back to the woman in the bed, who you now recognize as your mother. Just then a doctor enters the room. Ah, Mrs. Wilson, hope you're well. How's the little bundle of joy?" Your mother smiled "Very well. I've decided to name him Wade Jonathan Wilson Jr." Where is the father? " The doctor asked. Your mother suddenly frowned "His father is probably laying drunk in a gutter somewhere. "

Suddenly the scene changes, and you see yourself….
1553.title: A Prison Carol

info.brief_description: Can a human prisoner survive in a jail built for giant monsters? Keep it a fantasy please
info.description:
(9/21/2016: Under new management. Originally created by RedHurricane)

Monster Gaol

Welcome to Under Gloom, the most awful prison known to monster kind. Located 10,000 miles on a mountaintop above the city of Fearfield, this prison is nearly impossible to escape from. But that doesn’t mean you won’t try. You are a loutish human who was driven into Fearfield after committing a crime against monsters and thrown into Under Gloom. Now, you have to find a way to get out.

         Characters

Wade Wilson- The main character. You. You’re a human who was exiled to Fearfield and thrown in prison for setting fire to the skirt of a harmless monster visiting the human world. You hate monsters and will do anything to get out of this nightmare of a jail.

Lockette Ness- Your cellmate, a 500ft purple skinned Loch Ness Monster girl. Resembles a humanoid plesiosaur with a long neck, long indigo hair and fins for ears. She was imprisoned for aiding and abetting a smuggler. Unlike the other monsters, she’s friendly towards humans and would rather pay her debt to society than try to escape. Tries to warn you not to escape, but you never listen.

         Prison Staff

Warden Destiny- Your worst enemy and the biggest monster in the entire prison. A cyan skinned gargoyle with long pink reddish hair, four horns on her forehead and a generous hourglass figure. Destiny takes her job as warden very serious. Nobody has escaped Under Gloom since she took over and she intends to keep it that way. She despises you because you have tried to escape more times than anyone else in the prison’s history and her patience with you is wearing thin. However, this attitude isn’t out of prejudice against humans. Destiny bares a slight resemblance to Demona and hates it whenever someone points out how she looks like a cartoon character.

Belladonna Solanaceae- The vice warden. A 700ft yellow skinned manticore with a scorpion’s tail and three sets of sharp fangs. Belladonna is Destiny’s second in command. However, she is also after Destiny’s job as warden, basically the Starscream to Destiny’s Megatron. Destiny is aware of this ambition and the two of them don’t get along well. Belladonna might just let you go to get Destiny in trouble, if she doesn’t decide to eat you first. Belladonna's tail venom is lethal enough to kill a dinosaur.

Doris Potter- A giant gryphon who always wears a leather mask. Doris is the prison's executioner and whenever she appears, it means that a prisoner is going to be put to death. Destiny only calls on her when one the worst criminals in the prison is due to die, but if you keep misbehaving in Under Gloom, you might see her soon enough.

Iris Carumba- Iris is a red cyclops with a blue tattoo over her eye and long red hair. She's a special type of guard Destiny uses as a parole officer to check on prisons lucky enough to be let out of Under Gloom. However, Iris is as hard as parole officers come and likes to keep a close eye on the released prisoners under her watch.

The Doctor (real name unknown) - An 800ft tall living mannequin who is an OC of the 12th Doctor. Her skin is red plastic. She has long, blond Nylon hair and green glass eyes. She has a slim figure with slight curves. She has doll like joints, which gives her mechanical, stiff movements. She wears a lab coat and glasses. Very little is know about Under Gloom's doctor. Even her real name is unknown, so everyone simply calls her The Doctor. She is very good at her job, but she is also know to be emotionless. This makes it very hard to get to know her. She speaks in a British accent, so people often tease her by making Doctor Who references. She tends to ignore them.

         Guards- Destiny’s prison guards are mostly sadistic thugs that brutalize the prisons. While Destiny has forbidden them from killing the monster inmates, humans are fair game. There’s a rumor that most of the humans that get sent to Under Gloom are eaten by the bloodthirsty guards.

Cree Macbeth-Nile- A titanic 800ft tall werehyena, obese in body shape. She prefers not to wear clothes, but she can get away with it because of her fur covering her body. Cree is the most sadistic of the guards and a borderline sociopath who takes great enjoyment in the pain of the inmates. Unfortunately for you, humans are her favorite food and she always has her tongue sticking out. She has told you several times she looks forward to swallowing you whole.

Clover Marathon- A giant grootslang, a type of reptilian monster resembling a green scaly elephant with the hood of a cobra and a snake like trunk that acts as a second mouth. While not as hyperactive as Cree, she is still just as bloodthirsty as she is when it comes to humans. Clover has somewhat of a rivalry with Cree and the two have challenged each other to see which one eats you first. Resembles a monster version of Clover from Totally Spies.

Simone Sarutobi- A giant Nue girl. Basically a baboon with tiger arms and legs and a serpent’s tail. Simone is mute and only communicates through monkey like noises. However, she rarely eats humans and is far less sadistic than the other guards. She’s more likely to report you to Destiny.

Icy Coldwind- A giant hourglass shaped roc harpy with an owl like beak and bright blue feathers. Icy is the newest addition to the guards and is somewhat clumsy and inept. But just because she’s young, doesn’t mean she’s harmless. She enjoys the taste of humans just as much as Cree and Clover. She can also create ice and snow by flapping her wings. Ironically, she’s cousins with Elle from Monster Arms.

Aria Spectra Tazel - An 980ft tall Japanese Onryo who is an O.C. of the 12th Doctor. Aria has long, black hair that covers her face and pitch white skin with black eyes. She has an athletic build, but due to her macromastia, she has ZZ-Cup breasts. She wears the usual Under Gloom guard uniform tailored to fit her chest. When she was alive, Aria was a serious cop. After dying in a firefight, Aria came back as an Onryo to take revenge against the gang, which she got, but she then learned that she was permanently Earthbound. She moved to America and got a job at Under Gloom as a guard. She is cold and serious, never letting her guard down for a moment. She prides herself on never letting ANYONE escape.

         Inmates

Ariel Wrench- A 300ft yellow-green skinned gremlin girl. She was arrested up for chop-shopping. She’s good with tools and is trying to build a machine to help escape from Under Gloom but none of her inventions so far have been successful.

Bebe Ladin- An egyptian looking Cheshire cat giantess. She was a jewel thief who was eventually caught and sent to Under Gloom. She was hourglass shaped when she came in, but she’s been working out in the prison gym and has seriously buffed up, while still retaining her feminine looks. Despite your dislike for monsters, Bebe is very attracted to you and you might be able to use her. Destiny had her fitted with a collar to cancel out her invisibility.

Priscilla Toben- A pudgy palish white skinned orc sorceress. Priscilla is skilled in potions but was imprisoned for practicing medicine without a permit. Priscilla is still trying to work on a spell or potion to escape, but hasn’t had luck due to limited materials.

Darcy Fenton- An odd giantess boggart. She resembles a green gaseous ghost with plants and grass growing out of her back. It’s unknown what she’s in for because she never speaks to anyone and just stares off into space. The walls of the prison are specially designed to prevent creatures like her from ghosting out.

Cornelia Ojo- A titanic Argus, a monster with one hundred eyes all over her body and silvery skin. Cornelia was arrested for illegal gambling. You’re the only one who knows it but Cornelia is Destiny's personal prison snitch and your last three escape attempts failed because she ratted you out to Destiny. Needless to say, she’s one of your least favorite monsters in the prison.

Elaine Sarah Cotonza- A 750ft kitsune who is an OC of the 12th Doctor. Elaine has long red hair in a ponytail and red eyes. She has an houglass figure, though her incredibly large breasts are augmented. She has 8 fox tails, fox ears, and sharp teeth. She wears the usual Under Gloom inmate outfit. Destiny put a collar on her to cancel her shape shifting, though she can still change her voice. Elaine is a shape shifter who was arrested for Identity Theft when she tried to steal Destiny's identity. She had managed to take millions of dollars before she was caught and bought many things, including incredibly large breast implants. In Under Gloom, she's a fairly sociable prisoner, trying to get along with other inmates. She has a thing for muscular women, so she has a crush on Bebe.

Janice Carver - A 844ft succubus who is an OC of the 12th Doctor. Janice's face is split in two due to her accident. The right half has snow white skin, long, straight black hair, and a green eye. The left half is horrifically burned, with short white hair and a milky white eye, both ruined in the accident. She has Lactose Overload Syndrome, her breasts being the size of beanbag chairs. The rest of her is slightly chubby. Her left arm is as badly burned as the left half of her face. Her clothing reflects this, being half sexy, half modest. Janice is a very broken woman. Thanks to her accident (which no one is sure of the details) she has become angry and violent at the world, thinking it as vile and cruel. Due to her now resemblance to him, people have nicknamed her Lady Two-Face. She also shares a quirk with him, though she had it before her accident: she can't make a choice without a flip of her silver dollar coin.


         Dark Side Inmates- There is a hallway on your level called the Dark Side. The Dark Side is where they keep monsters who committed crimes so heinous, they’re locked up for life. No human that has crossed into the Dark Side has ever come out alive. You only know of five inmates here but most of the monsters in this area are carnivores that wouldn’t think twice about eating you.

Mariah Dark- A giant centaur with the lower body of a quagga (an extinct relative of the zebra). She was imprisoned for rape. The woman is so raunchy that she doesn't even care which species she attacks. You don’t know what she thinks about humans but being in her cell would be a horrible mistake. But you do know she only grabs male humans and you've yet to see one of them escape her clutches. Though you do hear a lot of screaming coming from her cell on a regular basis.

Ursula Minor- A titanic grizzly werebear with a hatred against fairies and similar monsters. Ursula led an anti-fairy riot against the governor that failed. She’s easily recognizable by her missing left eye. Like most monsters in Dark Side, she is predatory towards humans.

Persephone Howler- Alias, the white werewolf. A curvaceous albino werewolf girl imprisoned for cannibalizing other monsters. She’s locked up in her cell 24/7 because otherwise she’d attack the other inmates and has even gone after the guards. Persephone considers herself a gourmet among cannibals and was known for cooking her victims. However, she won’t pass off a yummy human. Persephone is a cousin of Lupa from Monster Arms and April from Monster Shores that neither of them like to talk about. Because of her vicious appetite, Destiny put a muzzle on her.

Arethusa Dragneel- Alias, the doomsday dragon. A European dragoness with orange brown scales, ram like horns and long blonde hair. Arethusa was imprisoned for manufacturing deadly bombs that were used for murder. She’s very reclusive and will breathe fire on anyone dumb enough to come close to her cell, even the guards. (Note: she has a dragon's face, not a humans. I'm getting sick of those models of dragons)

Yuri L- A titanic obese gorgon with blue pythons for hair. Yuri is the most dangerous monster in the entire prison. A deranged serial killer who abused her gorgon eyes to kill over one hundred monsters so she could mutilate their stone corpses for her own twisted amusement. Upon her imprisonment Yuri was fitted with a visor to negate her petrifying gaze. As sadistic as she is towards monsters, Yuri has been known to grab any human unfortunate enough to get close to her cell with her snake hair to either eat or torture.

Sakuya- An addition by UltraGTS. Sakuya is a black spider drider resembling a pale skinned child despite being an adult. Sakuya committed every crime known to monster and human alike, but instead of giving her the death penalty, she was attached to a machine that puts her in an endless coma so she'd live out the rest of her natural life dreaming. However, the device can attach to humans to put them in her dreamworld and dying in the dream means dying in reality.

         Other

Jacqueline Liza- A red haired hourglass shaped fairy. Jacqueline is the governor of the tri-city area of Horrorville, Terrordale and Fearfield and Destiny's boss. Sometimes she visits the prison to inspect it. You're not sure what she thinks of humans or if she knows a human is in the prison. She's deathly afraid of Ursula because the werebear made an attempt on her life.

Bona Fete- An addition by Anonymous One. A 950ft tall muscular and gray skinned gargoyle bounty hunter who filled most of the cells in Under Gloom with captured criminals. She mainly wears a chest plate with a Punisher style skull on it with kevlar pants and combat boots and has black hair with tattoos covering her arm for everyone she's ever killed. Bona Fete is a loose cannon bounty hunter who will kill any target no matter what their crime was. Destiny doesn't like her much both because Destiny isn't fond of bounty hunters and because Bona is the daughter of the man who impregnated Destiny and left her. Regardless, if you do manage to escape, Bona might be sent to bring you back to Under Gloom Dead or Alive.

Sekushi Kami (nickname Shi) - An 850ft Hari-onago who is an OC of the 12th Doctor. Shi's most notable feature is her immensely long, black hair, which ends in barbs. Her hair seems to be longer then she is tall. She has grey eyes and grey skin. She has above-average breasts, a slim waist, and a massive butt. She usually wears skimpy clothing to show off her curves. Shi can be described as a massive flirt. She loves women with a passion. Even if they are married, she'll "put the moves on them", flirting and showing off her body as much as possible. Her favorite targets are ghosts and women with ludicrously large chests, though anyone is fair game. If it's somebody who meets both of the above, she'll drop everything and focus only on them. However, she won't go after men or people under 20. She can control her hair, using them like extra hands. Lately, she's been going after Aria.

Rules

Try not to end the story too soon
All monsters are giantesses. Normally 300ft is the minimum but many monsters in the prison exceed that height.
No toilet stuff
Fantasy monsters only. No mechas or mutates.
No underage monsters. It’s a prison for crying out loud.
This is a woman’s prison so male monsters are to be kept to a minimum. Male humans in the prison are fine.
Nothing heavily sexual. Keep it PG13
Please no Male Preds or any interaction with Male Giant privates! I thought I didn't have to say it!


Please also be willing to read and add to my other two monster giantess stories.

Monster Shores
http://www.Writing.Com/main/interact/item_id/1927548-Monster-Shores

and

Monster Arms
http://www.Writing.Com/main/interact/item_id/1897471-Monster-Arms

Have fun

Special thanks goes to Spiral-And-Twist, Anonymous One, Ultimate Neo, Infinitebull and CrimsonFreak
